column3: Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ ɛkɔŋ chi nɛchyɛ anɛ Yesu áchyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ. Nɛ bɛsɛ nkwɔ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛka, yɛ̌ chi nɛwú, ɛ̌ti batɨ.
Ɛpǎ Nɛkɨŋɨ ɛ́pɛ́rɛ ghaka, Yesu arɨŋɨ bɛ mpok akway anɛ yi árɔ mmɨk, ampɛtnsɛm ntá ɛtayi. Ndǔ yi ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bǒbhi fá amɨk, nɛ́nɛ atɔ́ŋ bɛ́ akɔŋ bɔ acha.
Bɔ agha bákʉ́ nyaka Mandɛm ambe ntɨ ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay? Pú bo abhɛn bákʉ́ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bágú amɛm baso?
Tɛ̌ndu bǎchi bo abhɛn bǎghòk Mandɛm, bǎkɛ́ yibhiri mmʉɛt mǎnkóŋó bɛpɔ̌ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka mpok bǎbhʉɛ́t amɛm ɛjuri.
Mandɛm arɔ́ bo mankɛm mǎnchwe ndǔ kɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti nɛtaŋántɨ ɛnap bɛ yi angɔ bhɔ mankɛm ntínso.

Ngók ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛyɔŋ ndu ɛ́fù nɛ́ntɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛpɛ́m mɛnwi. Ɛyɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛre rɛm bɛ, “Nkáp bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn nywɔp nɛmɔt ákway bɛku nkɔ́bhɛ́ nchwi ɛnwi. Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ nkáp wu ánkway bɛ́ku chi nkɔ́p ɛnyǔ nchwi anɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ taŋ ɛsiɛ byo nɛ ɛpay. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti bawɛt nɛ mmɛm.”
Sɔt ká mmʉɛt mbɔ bɛ́ bǎpú yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛsí Mandɛm, nɛ chɔŋ yi ankosi bhe.

mbɔnyunɛ abhʉ́rɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn yi átàŋ bǒ mankɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛchi chak. Anáŋ ayap mmu anɛ átàŋ manyé yɔ, nɛ atɔ́ŋ ɛrɨŋ bɛkʉ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm mándɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu wu, ndu ákʉ́ yi ápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.”
Batɛmɛ́ nɛnu básɔ́t bɔ̌batábhɛ́nɔk abhɛn báchí nsěnse, mánɨ́ ntá bábáy yi anti, barɛm bɛ chi nta kɛfɔ. Básɔ́t nkú chu bafyɛ́ yi amʉɛt, bárɛm bɛ chí ayi nkú kɛfɔ.
Nkɔŋ yɛ bɛ́ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn bábhʉɛ́t nɛ manoŋ amʉɛt mámbáy manɛ́m, mámbe bɔ, mánkɛm bɛkɛt ɛbhap sayri, bɛ bákɛ́ chyɛ mǔmpap ywɛsɛ mbi bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ.
Nokó ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ngátí bhe bɛ́ nchí babhat nɛ Ɛtaya nɛ Ɛtaya achi babhat nɛ mɛ. Mbák bápú kway mɛnoko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌rɛ̀m, nokó ká ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀.”
Mámɛ́sɛ yɛ Nɛwú nɛ Ɛtɔkɔ́ Bawú amɛm nɛpǐngó. Arɛ́ kɛ̌ nɛwú ɛnɛn nɛjwi apay nɛchi.

Sayri sayri, mbɔ yi ǎrɔ̀ŋ nyaka amfay ndɔŋ nɛ ndɔŋ ndu bɛchyɛ akap, mbʉ́ yi abhɔŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti mmɨk. Kɛ abhésí ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy ndǔ ngwɛnti mpok achyɛ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap anɛ ápɔ́kɔ́ bɛbʉ́ bo.
Ndǔ mamiɛ́ bɛsa bɛpay, abhak nɛ bhɔ́ amɛm baso, abhɔ́ŋ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ nɛ bhɔ.
Bɔ̌ma, mpok anɛ bǎchɛmti bɛ mǎnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ ɛkɔŋ kɛ mǎnyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ Acha, bo abhɛn báyámbɨ, bábhɔŋ mɛnoŋ batɨ.
Mpok Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n ánɛ́nɛ́ ɛtabhɛ́ sɛrwɔ ɛnɛ ɛjwi ɛtandat, njɨŋɨ, ngɔ́ ɛrɛmɛ́ nɛnyɨkɨsi mmɨk. Mmok arɔp pyɔɔ mbɔ ndɛn nɛkwɛsɛ́. Ntaŋ arɔp mbɔ manoŋ.

Nɛka nɛ́kʉ́ mbɔk baghɔrɛ́ bághɔ́ ndǔ bǒbhap abhɛn bágú bápɛ́rɛ́nsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Bádɛ́n mbɔk kpát bágú, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ kɛka bɛ́fɛ́rɛ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm bɛ mamfɛrɛ bhɔ amɔ́. Báká bɛ ɛ́rɨ tontó bɛ bɔ mángú bɛ́ Mandɛm ankʉ bɔ mampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́rɨ nɛcha.

Kɛ Pɔ̌l arɛm ntá bo mbɨ̌ŋ nkú bɛ, “Báway bhɛsɛ nɛ mantɛm bɛsí bho, mámɛsɛ bhɛsɛ́ ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ ɛnɛ́ bábhɨkɨ taŋ bhɛsɛ yɛ̌ndu sɛchi bǒ Rom. Nɛ́nɛ, báyàŋ sɛ́mfú sɛ́ndɔ́k bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́? Wáwák! Bɔ́ babhɔŋ bǒbatí bábhɔŋ bɛ́twɔ ndu mmʉɛt ɛyap mámfɛrɛ bhɛsɛ́.”

Bɛbhé Mandɛm bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp” nɛ, “Ɔkɛ́ way mmu” nɛ, “Ɔkɛ́ ghɛp aghɛp” nɛ, “Ɔkɛ́ fyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmu achak.” Ɛbhé ɛ́mɔt ɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm nɛ bɛchak nkwɔ. Nɛ ɛbhé ɛyɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Kɔŋ ntɨ nkwǎ mbɔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ.”
Nɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhákántɨ bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari ɛnyu ɛyɔ, ǎbhʉ̀rɛ ntɨ ɛni pɛ́pɛ́p mbɔ Kristo.
Nkɔŋ ɛbhé Mandɛm nɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛnkɛm.
Bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm bɛ bǎchí bǒ Yesu Acha. Mbʉɛ́t bɛ́sɛ́mti bhe, bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm.
Njibhiri yɛ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́ghɔ mmu anɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛ́twɔ̀ ntá ya. Ngɔ́ mɛnyɨŋ pú tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ mkpak.
Nɛ mpok Mandɛm áyɨ́kɨ́ arɛm bɛ, “Bápú kway bɛchwe ndǔ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ɛna wáwák”, ntɨkɨ bho yi árɛ́mɛ́ nyaka nɔ ɛ̌ti yap? Pú bǒ abhɛn bápú ghok nyaka yi?
Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bayambɨ bátwɔ́ kɛ mɛ̌twɔ̀, chí baghɛ́p nɛ baghɛ́p bataŋ bataŋ. Baghɔŋɔmɛn ábhɨ́kɨ́ ghók bhɔ.
Bǒ bɛtok, bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt bɛsí bachi abhɛka nɛ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhak ɛnyu ɛyɔ ndiɛrɛ nɛ abhɛn bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ abhɛn bákɛ̀m be sayri. Bák ká ɛnyu yɔ yɛ̌ chi nɛ abhɛn báchí bɛběbɛbe.
Bátwɔ́ nɛ batísyɛ ákwárɛ́ abhɛn bárɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Mmǔ-nɛ apú rɔ bɛrɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ mpoknkɛm ɛ̌ti ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm ywɛsɛ́ nɛ nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛbhé Moses.
Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm mɛ́mbák ɛnyu ɛyɔ. Yí kɛ átó Kristo ánkʉ sɛ́mpɛ́tnsɛm ntá yi, nɛ achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ bɛtɨk bɛkʉ bo mámpɛ́tnsɛm mámbɔŋ kpák nɛ Mandɛm.

Bɔ̌ma, bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk barɛmɛ́ kɛpǐntɨ Mandɛm, bo bárɛ̀m nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ bɔ́ antɨ bɛ mándɛm. Báchí bɛrɨ́tí bɛrɨŋ ntá yɛsɛ́. Bɔ́ bábhɔ̀ŋ nyaka bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, yɛ̌ nɔ́, mánkɛbhɛ nɔkɔ chí ntɨ.
Nɛ chɔŋ ɛmbak bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhɨ̀ŋɨ Acha bɛ ánkwák yi, Acha ǎpɛmɛ yi.’”

mandɛmɛ nɔkɔ bɛ, “Amen! Ɛrɨ bǒ mándɛm mpoknkɛm bɛ Mandɛm aywɛsɛ kɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtaŋ. Achi ndɨŋɨndak nɛ abhɔ̌ŋ kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm. Sɛnchyɛ́ yi bakak, sɛnchyɛ́ yi kɛnókó, sɛ́mbɨti yi. Abhɔŋ bɛyǎ mɛnwɔp!” Amen.
Bɛrɨ ɛbhɛka bɛkɛ fú chi ndǔ mmʉɛt bɛsɔbhɛri nɛ bati bɛ́ghóko nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ pú nɛ ndu bɛfyɛ bɛrɨ́tí ndɛn.

Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ ntíánwɔ́p bɛghati bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛ̌ti Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu. Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti ya, yɛ̌ndu nchí mǔkɛnɔŋ ɛ̌ti nsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi. Kɛ dɔ̌ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ wɔ mɛ́nkwák wɔ ɔ́nka ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ mɛ ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ Yesu.
Nɛ ɛ̌ti yap, nchyɛ́ mmʉɛt ntá yɛ bɛbhak nyáŋá bɛ́ bɔ́ nkwɔ́ mankway bɛbhak nyáŋá tɛtɛp.
Ŋɛmɛ́ ká mǎmfyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ mandu bɛtaŋ anɛ árɔ́bhɛ́ ákɛ́ kpɨkɨ ɛ́may mǎngú. Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ ngɔ́ bɛ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ jwi pɔɔt bɛsí Mandɛm mmu mɛ́tòk.
Ángɛl anɛ ájwí bárát apɨkɨri ɛyi ɛkwɔbhɛ́ bɛběntɨ amɛm manyɛ́n agho nɛ bɔ̌manyɛ́n nɛ ndǔ bɛbhak ɛbhɛn manyiɛp ányay arɛ. Manyiɛp mankɛm arɔp chi manoŋ.
Kristo akʉ sɛ́bhɔŋ mbi bɛbhak ɛnyu ɛnɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛbhak nɛ bhɛsɛ bɛfʉɛt ndu nɛka ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ yi. Nɛ sɛbhɔŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ sɛbhaka ntɨ ndǔ kɛnɛ́m ɛkɛn sɛ́bhɔŋ chɔŋ nɛ Mandɛm.

Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ yɛ̌ nkoŋo baghɔrɛ́, nɛ yɛ̌ chi mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́pú amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p, nɛ mmu anɛ afyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak apú bhɔŋ ákɔ́rɛ́ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt kɛfɔ Kristo nɛ Mandɛm. Mmu anɛ afyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak achi mbɔ mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɔmandɛm bachak mbɔnyunɛ akɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ acha Mandɛm.

Nɛka Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ákʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm aghati yi. Mpok Mandɛm ábhɨ́ŋɨ́ yi bɛ́ ámfá, ándɔ́k nɛbhʉɛt anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi, arɔ ɛtɔk ɛyi, are kɔ andɔk nɔkɔ, kɛrɨŋɨ atú anɛ́ yi árɔŋ.
Bǎkɛ́ bhak bakwɛnɛ́ mmɛ́m. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt, ɛ́ntwɔ yɛ yi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Kɛ dɔ̌ ká Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ambak nɛ bhe, ambɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ nɛpɛ́m yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka.
Chɔŋ bɛyǎ bho mánkoŋo bɛpɔ̌ barak ɛpúsí yap nɛ ɛyɔ ɛnkʉ bo bachak mándɛm bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti mbi anɛ tɛtɛp.
Chi bɛfʉɛt ntá Yesu Kristo kɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm ákwàk bhɛsɛ nɛ be bɛ sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ mbi bɛrɔŋ ntá Ɛta.

Mbák chi bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, sɛ́to bɔ bɛkáti ndu bɛ́gháti bhɔ́ bɛ́ bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ báchyɛ́ ntá mandɛm nsé mbɔ akap. Nɛ bɛ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ manoŋ nɛ nnya anɛ manoŋ ami ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk, nɛ bɛ́ bǎkɛ́ fyɛ amɔ ndǔ barak ɛpúsí.”
Kɛ Píta abhɛp yi bɛ, “Ananías, ndaká yí ɔ́rɔ́ Satan ánkó wɔ́ antí bɛ ɔ́nsé nsé ntá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nɛ ɔrɔ mbɔk nkáp anɛ ɔ́tí mmɨk ansɛm?

Sɛ́kɛ́pɛrɛ bhák bo abhɛn bachi mbɔ mɔ́áchwi anɛ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́dɛ̀p ɛ́ntɛn ɛbhé ɛ́mɔt, ɛ́ndɛp ɛntɛn ɛbhé ɛchak mpok batɔŋɔ́ nse bárwɔ̀ bhɔ nɛ nsé yap. Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bákʉ̀ bo manɛm ɛbhɨ ndu bákòŋo baraká nse anɛ bɔ́ bátɔ̀ŋ.

Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ ɛwak, Mandɛm apú bhák Mfɔ ntá bǒ abhɛn bápú chak kɛ? Mmu ákɛ́ rwɔ mmʉɛt. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákʉ̀ barak ɛpʉsi, yɛ̌ agha anɛ ákòŋo bɔmandɛm bachak, nɛ bakwɛnɛ́ bɛrwɔp, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbakanɛm anɛ ákʉ̀ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ nɛ ntɨ mbakanɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ákʉ̀ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́ nɛ ntɨ ngɔrɛ́,
Sɛ́kɛ́ fɛrɛ ntí ndu bɛchɛm nɛ batɨ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk bo bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ. Ɛnyɨŋ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛ sɛ́mfyɛ́ nɔkɔ batɨ ntɨ, sayri sayri, nɛ́nɛ, ɛnɛ́ nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu átwɔ̀ nɛchi kɛkwɔt.

Sǒ yɛ́ ka amɔ́ mǎmfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́yɨ̀ŋɨ nɛpɛ́m nɛsɨ́ ɛnɛka. Nɔ chi ɛpúsí, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bɛpɔ̌ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ, nɛ mɛ́ŋwáka ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ, nɛ nkaysi bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, nɛ yɛ̌chi bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak mbɔnyunɛ bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ chi bɛsɔt bhɔ mbɔ bɔmandɛm mmɨk.

Kɛ tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí chí bǒ ngósí, sɛ́nkɛ́m mmʉɛt. Sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ mɛ́nóko Yesu nɛ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bo, bɛ ɛyɔ ɛmbák mbɔ kɛndɛ́n anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákɛ́mɛ́ bɛchyɛt mmʉɛt. Sɛ́mbáká ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Yesu ampɛmɛ bhɛsɛ, nɛ bɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́mbák ntá yɛsɛ́ mbɔ ntá ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu anɛ ákuti ntí ywi.
Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ abhɨ́kɨ́ chyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɨ bɛcháy. Ǎchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ chi nɛtaŋántɨ, nɛ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ nɛkɛ́mɛ́mʉɛt.
Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm” kɛ yi kɛbháká kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ achí nsěnse nɛ tɛtɛp apu nɛ yi.
Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ nkaysi amɔt, mǎmbɔ́ŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ batɨ, mǎmbak ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔ́t ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎkʉ nɛ ntɨ nɛ́mɔ́t. Mbák mǎnkʉ́ nɔ́, maŋák ama ǎyá ancha.
Ɛnyɨŋ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ ɛ́kʉ́ báré yaŋ bɛkɛm yi, kɛ yɛ̌ mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ tɔk yi awɔ amʉɛt, mbɔnyunɛ mpok ayi abhɨ́kɨ́ re kway nyaka.
Ghatí bɔ́ mánkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛrɨ. Mánkʉ́ nɔkɔ bɛrɨ ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Bákɛ́ taŋ awɔ́. Mánkɔrɛ nɔkɔ nɛ batɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ maŋák.
Bákɛ́mɛ yi bɛ, “Mbɔ mmǔ nɛ apú nkʉ bɛbʉ́, mbʉ́ sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá ntá yɛ nɛ yi.”

Bo abhɛn básɔ̀t mbɔk manywɔp bɛ acha achak bákʉ̀ nɔ chi bɛchyɛ Acha kɛnókó. Mmǔ anɛ ányìɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ákʉ̀ nɔ chi bɛchyɛ Acha kɛnókó, tɛ̌ndu áchyɛ̀ Mandɛm bakak kɛ anyiɛ yɔ. Nɛ mmu anɛ apu nyiɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ǎkʉ̀ nɔ chi ndu áyàŋ bɛchyɛ Acha kɛnókó nkwɔ nɛ ǎchyɛ̀ bakak ntá Mandɛm.
Bɔ́ŋ ká maŋák ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎbháká ntɨ arɛ́ bɛ Mandɛm ankʉ ntá yɛka. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ ndǔ mpok ɛsɔŋɔri. Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm.
Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ ntá mǔnti batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bɛ́ ámfyɛ́ Pɔ̌l anywɔ́p, mambabhɛri nɔkɔ yi, kɛ ámbɔ́ŋ ngangaŋ mandú. Nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ kaŋ mamʉɛrɛ bhi bɛrɔŋ bɛghɔ yi nɛ bɛchyɛ yi nɛkwak.
Mmu anɛ akɔŋ bo, apú fɛrɛ ntɨ nɛ bo abhɛn bakʉ̌ bɛbʉ́, ápú rɔ bɛ́fyɛ ntí nɛ bo mpoknkɛm, ápú rɔ bɛbhaka ntɨ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛmbak sayri, nɛ ǎte kpirí ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nkúbhɛ́ ɛfóŋó nɛka mbɔ mmǔ anɛ arɛmɛ mbɔ ɛnyu ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Nnókó, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ ndɛm”. Bɛse nkwɔ sɛ́noko, nɛ ɛ̌ti yɔ sɛ́ghàti bo Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
Bɔ̌ma, sɛmtí nɔ́kɔ́ bábhɔ́t, mǎmfyɛ nɔkɔ abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛcháy ntɨ. Kwak nɔ́kɔ́ ká abhɛn mmʉɛt ápú bhɔ. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
Ángɛl anɛ ájwí batay apɨkɨri ɛyi ɛkwɔp ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛnɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ. Ɛjuri ɛ́kwɛ́n amʉɛt bo abhɛn yi achi Mfɔ wap. Bǒ bábho mɛŋa barɨ yap ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ bɔ bachi arɛ,
Kpák ambak nɛ bhe, ntínso Mandɛm nɛ́mbak nɛ bǒ Mandɛm mankɛm abhɛn bákòŋo ɛbhé ɛkɔ ɛnɛ.
Mánaŋ bátɔŋ nyaka yí mbi Yesu Acha nɛ ághàti nyaka bo mɛnyɨŋ abhɛn bɛ́dù yi antɨ bɛghati bo ɛ̌ti Yesu nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ bɛchi. Kɛ arɨŋɨ chí nɛjwiti ɛnɛn Jɔ̌n atɔŋɔ bo.
Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka ǎnyìɛ chí nɛnyíɛ́, yɛ̌ ɛnyɨŋ kɛ̌ yí ányù, abhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɔ́ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bo bághɔ̀ mánchyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó.

Kɛ Kristo achyɛ́ bhe Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ Mmu achi nɛ bhe. Bǎbhɨ́kɨ́ chɛp yɛ mmu anɛ ákway bɛtɔŋ bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bhe mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi átɔ̀ŋ bhe ɛchi tɛtɛp. Nsé apu arɛ. Nchí ghati yɛ bhe bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ átɔ̀ŋ bhe, bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛbhak ndǔ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ.

Tɛ̌ndu yi ákʉ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ Mandɛm ǎsɔ́t bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí bhi, dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔnyǔ mmu apu kway bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m mbák abhɨkɨ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ ɛ̌yú, nɔ́ kɛ ɛchi bɛ mbák mmu apú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áyàŋ bo mankʉ, nɛrɛm yi árɛ̀m bɛ abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhak chi ndɛ́ndɛm.
Pɔ̌l árɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, asɔt brɛt anɨkmʉɛt achyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm bɛsí bhap mankɛm, abɔ́k abho mɛ́nyiɛ́.

Sɛ́nsɨ́ŋ chí ɛkáti sɛ́ngáti bhɔ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ nɛnyíɛ́ nɛ nya anɛ áfú ndǔ akap anɛ báchyɛ́ ntá mandɛm nsé, nɛ bɛ mándɔ ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ́ nya ɛnɛ́ manoŋ amap ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔŋ amɨk, nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ nyiɛ manoŋ.

Pɔ̌l arɛm bɛ, “Wɔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́rí nkok anɛ bawati nɛ mbɨ pɛ́pɛ́p bɛ bo bǎkɛ́ rɨŋɨ! Chɔŋ Mandɛm andɛp wɔ. Ɔchɔ́kɔ́ afɔ bɛ́sɔt ɛbhé ɔ́ntaŋ mɛ, nɛ ɔ̌rɛ̀m bɛ mándɛp mɛ ɛnɛ́ ɛbhé ɛbhɨkɨ chyɛ wɔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɔ̌? .”
Nɛ́nɛ, yɛ̌ mbi apu anɛ Mandɛm árɛm bɛ bo abhɛn bábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo bákwɛn manyé.
Bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́kɨ́ yap bhɛsɛ chi bɛ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn yi átàŋ anchyɛ ntɛmsi. Ayap bhɛsɛ chi bɛ ánkʉ Yesu Kristo Acha ámpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.

Yi amfú arɛ́ andɔk bɛrwɔ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm. Bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛtɔkɔ́ mmɨk ɛbhɔ bɛ Gɔ́g nɛ Mágɔg. Satan anchɛm yɛ bǒ bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn mankɛm ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bɛ mandɔk nɛnu nɛ Mandɛm. Bǒ bɛtɔk ɛbhɔ báya mbɔ ɛ̌siɛ́p ɛnɛ ɛchi angɔkɔ manyu.

Nɛ nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ̌ mbɔk yɛká báchí nyaka. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ anáŋ asó bɛbʉ́ bhɛka afɛ́rɛ́, akʉ bɛ́ mǎmbák bo Mandɛm. Nɛ ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo Acha ákʉ́, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ akʉ nkwɔ́ bɛ́ be mǎmbák chak bɛsí Mandɛm.

Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ nchí ghɔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛnkɛm. Kɛ mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p mbɔnyunɛ ndɨ́ŋɨ́ mmu anɛ nnókó. Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛkɛm bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn yi achyɛ mɛ sayri kpátɛ bɛghaka ɛwak ɛnɛ yi átwɔ̀.
Nɨk nɔ́kɔ́ ká mmʉɛt mpoknkɛm nɛ ɛ̌ti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áyà bhe mbi. Bǎk ká pě. Kɛ́m nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛkɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛ̌ti bǒ Mandɛm mankɛm bɛ yi ankwak bhɔ.

Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ̌ nchí sɨ́ŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá yɛka nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Tɛsalónika. Nchí sɨŋ ntá yɛka bǒ Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛtayɛsɛ nɛ be bho bǎbhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha. Nchí fá nɛ Sáilas nɛ Tímɔti. Mandɛm antɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák.
Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ángɔ́ bɛ́ bǎpú mmʉɛt gum gum ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛka. Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛ Yesu Acha ǎpɛ̀tnsɛm mandú mpok.
Ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bɛ́ kpatɛ mpok anɛ Acha ápɛ̀tnsɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ mǎnyìɛ brɛt anɛ, mǎnyú mmɛ̌m amɛn, bǎghati bo bɛ́ yi agu nyaka ndu bɛ́pɛ́mɛ bhɛsɛ́.
Nɛ mbák bápú makati bɛ Mandɛm ǎghok nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛnap, mmǔ nɛme ǎtaŋ. Mandɛm Acha ǎkʉ mmu nɛme antaŋ, amfoŋori yɛ̌ntɨkɨ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́.

Tímɔti, nchí kaka Mandɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ntá yi nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛchí amɛm pɛ́pɛ́p mbɔ bachǐmbɨ bha bákʉ̀ nyaka. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt ndu bɛ́káka Mandɛm bɛti nɛ ngósí, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok, anɛ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́kwɛ́n wɔ amʉɛt.
Báre bhɛsɛ arɛ́ mámbɨŋɨ nɔkɔ njiɛ nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ sɛtárɛ́bhɛ́ bɛ, “Kwɛ́n ká kuti bɛsɛ bɛ́ sɛ́kɛ ghɔ bɛsí mmu anɛ achi chɔkɔ ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ bɛ ntɛmsi Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n akɛ́ bhak nɛ bhɛsɛ.

Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ batú ángók ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm árɛ̀m ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ. Mmǔ anɛ ánú asɔt awɔ́nɛm, chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yi nɛnyíɛ́ ɛnɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ mána, ɛnɛn bábhɛ́sɛ́ amfay. Nɛ chɔŋ nchyɛ́ yí ntay nkwɔ ɛnɛn nɛchi pɛ́pɛ́p, ɛnɛ́n básɨ́ŋɨ́ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ arɛ́. Yɛ̌ mmu abhíkí rɨŋɨ nnyɛ́n nɛkɔ ɛnɔ, ɛbhɨkɨ fʉɛt chi mmu anɛ báchyɛ̀ yi nɔ.”
Nɛ chɔŋ batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ mánsɔt bɛyɔŋɔ́ nse ndu bɛrwɔ bhe bɛ mányiɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛka nɛ ngwáy yap. Mandɛm ánáŋ átàŋ bɔ tɛ mpok anɛ afʉɛrɛ ansɛm nɛ ɛrɔp chi bɛ mámbɔ́ŋ ntɛmsi yap.
Ɛ̌ti yɔ, Mandɛm ǎto ɛtati ɛ́njwi bɔ antɨ ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ bárɔbhɛ noko chi baraká nsé.
Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bě bo Israɛl bǎkʉ̀ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bárɛ̀m ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Mandɛm.”

Batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bágʉɛti mmʉɛt mǎnchwe ndǔ manɛrɛ́kɛt mánu nɔkɔ bɛ́ bo bákɛ́ noko tɛtɛp Mandɛm. Báchi mbɔ Jánɛs nɛ Jambrɛs bo mánú nyaka bɛ bo bákɛ́ noko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm átó Moses ángati Mfɔ Íjip. Báchí bǒ bɛbɛ́ptí nkaysi nɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu tɛtɛp.
“Nchí nyurɛ bo abhɛn nkɔ́ŋɔ́, nchyɛ́ bhɔ ntɛmsi. Fiɛ́ yɛ ka bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak, mantɨk nsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́chí yɛ chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ́nɛ ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Yesu, sɛ́chí ndu kpák nɛ Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Acha ywɛsɛ Yesu Kristo ákʉ́ ntá yɛsɛ.
Sɔt mpok nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ. Kɛ́m bɔ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ mbɔnyunɛ mbák ɔ́nkʉ ɛnyu yɔ, chɔŋ ɔ́mpɛmɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛ nɛ bo abhɛn ɔ́tɔ̀ŋ.

Mpok nɛ mpok, nchí rɔŋ nyaka ndǔ bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt mɛnkɛm nchyɛ́ nɔkɔ bhɔ ntɛ́msi bɛkʉ bɔ mandɛm ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Mbɔ̌ŋ bɛyǎ bɛběntɨ nɛ bhɔ́ kpát ndɔk nɔkɔ bɛtɔk bo báchák ndu bɛ́chyɛ́ bhɔ nɛnyok arɛ́.
Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt nkwǎ átò mmu ankʉ bɛ́pú bhɛsɛ. Bɛchi chi bɛbʉ́ kɛbhʉ́rɛ́, nɛ bɛpɔ̌ nkaysi ndu baraká kɛbhʉrɛ nɛ mɛ́ŋwáka ndǔ baraká kɛbhʉrɛ.
Mmu anɛ ápɨ̀ mbwɔ́t nɛ mmu anɛ ámyàkati manyiɛp arɛ́ bápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ, Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ mbwɔ́t ángó kɛ̌ ákʉ̀ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
Nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ bɛ́ ndǔ bǎchi nɛ amɨ́k ambi mǎnòŋ Yesu Kristo Acha ámpɛ́tnsɛm, bǎbhɔŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ akap anɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ̀.
Ngók ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fù amfay. Ɛ́bhak mɛ batú mbo ɛwarɛ́ tutunyɛ́n nɛ mbɔ nɛfaŋ anɛ ásày nɛ mbɔ ɛyɔŋɔ bakɨŋ anɛ bɔ̌ bákwɛ̀t.
Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ mankɛm bárɛ̀m nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, yɛ̌ agha anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Yesu, Mandɛm ǎfoŋori bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi ɛ̌ti yi Yesu.”
Bo abhɛn bákɛ̀m ɛkɨ́kɨ́ ndǔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀, báfyɛ̀ bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhɔ kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn mmu ápú gu. Mandɛm ǎchyɛ̀ bhɔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.

Mmɛ Jɔ̌n nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ ntá bɛka bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt abhɛn báchí atú Esia. Mandɛm mmu achi nɛ́nɛ, abhak tɛ̌ nyaka, nɛ ǎtwɔ̀ ántɔ́ŋ be bɛrɨ̌ndu, anchyɛ bhe kpák. Bɛfóŋó tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛchi bɛsí ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ Mandɛm mɛ́ntɔ́ŋ nkwɔ bhe bɛrɨ̌ndu, mɛ́nchyɛ be kpák.
Pɔ̌l abho yɛ bɛkʉ bɔ́ mánjwímɛm. Arɛm bɛ, “Jɔ̌n ǎjwìti nyaka bo bɛtɔŋ bɛ bátɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhap angati nɔkɔ bo Israɛl bɛ́ bábhɔŋ mɛ́nóko mmu anɛ átwɔ̀ yi ansɛm, nɔ chi Yesu.”

Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ Mandɛm Acha arɨ́ŋɨ́ ndu áfɛrɛ bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bo Mandɛm bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, nɛ ndu átɛ̀msi bo abhɛn bápù chak, bɛ ntɛmsi yap ambak nɛ bhɔ tɛ ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn manyé.
Báyàŋ nyaka chi ɛtɔk ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́ ɛ́chá, nɔ chi ɛnɛ ɛchí amfay. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ̌ ntíánwɔ́p apu nɛ Mandɛm bɛ bɔ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ yi bɛ Mandɛm awap. Sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm aghókó ɛtɔk abhʉrɛ ntá yap.
Ɔ́kɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛ́kʉ nɛ bɛchákárí mbok ɛ̌ti bachǐmbɨ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú ka mmu ánchyɛ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Fíɛ́ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ nɛmbak mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyaŋ.
Bǒbhɔ bárɔ́k mbaŋ ɛnkɛm bákáp ɛtɔk ɛnɛ bo Mandɛm bachi arɛ, nɔ chi, ɛtɔk ɛnɛ Mandɛm akɔŋɔ. Kɛ ngó áfú amfay ndǔ nɛbu ásɔ́ŋ bɔ kurukotok.
Achyɛ yɛ ɛyɔŋ bɛ́ mánjwiti bhɔ́ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo. Bájwítí bhɔ. Bárɛm bɛ Píta anchɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ ndu mpǎy manywɔp.
Bǎrɨŋɨ sayri bɛ báyà bo abhɛn bachi mbɔ manɛ́mámɨk mbi nɛ bɛ bǎchi mbɔ ɛrɔŋɔ ntá bo abhɛn bachi amɛm ɛjuri.
Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ Kristo yímbɔŋ afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ chi nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti?

Kɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ nɛchí kɛkúrí. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ chi bɛ nɛ́pú fyɛ mmu bakwap antɨ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kòŋo chí bɛ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n Mandɛm áchyɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbák sayri nɛ batɨ, nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ákɛ́ bhɔŋ ntɨ gum gum, nɛ́kʉ̀ mmu ámbɔ́ŋ ɛpɨŋ bɛghɔ bho ntínso, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ bɛrɨ mpoknkɛm. Mmǔ anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛ́n nɛ́fù ntá Mandɛm, ǎbhák mmu tɛtɛp, ápú kʉ bɛtábhá.
Ɛta Mandɛm akɔŋ Mɔ́ywi nɛ afyɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm yi awɔ. Mandɛm achyɛ́ yi Ɛfóŋó ɛyi njɛnti ti.

Mbɔk bho bákaysi bɛ Mandɛm ǎchɔ̀ŋti mpok tontó ndu bɛ́bhʉɛ́rɛ bariɛp ami. Ápú chɔŋti mpok mbɔ ɛnyu bɔ́ bákáysí. Ǎkɛp chi ntɨ nɛ bhe, ndu ápú yaŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu angu anɛm. Ǎyàŋ chi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ántɨ́knsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ bhi.

bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ámbák ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyi kɛbhɔ́ŋ ngɔrɛ́ mbɔ mɛ, kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ aywi akap anɛ́ Mandɛm áchyɛ́ yi. Achyɛ́ mbɔk akap bɛ́bhɔŋ nɛbhay, achyɛ báchák chí akap bɛ́chɔ́kɔ ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap kɛbháy nɛbhay.
Fiɛ́ ká ntí ndǔ bɛ́bhɔŋ ɛkɔŋ nɛ bho, mǎmbɔŋ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ánchyɛ́ be akap, sayri sayri, akap bɛ́gháti bho mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́fú ntá Mandɛm.

Ndǔ nɛbhǒnɛt, ɛnɛ́ Mandɛm ághòko mmɨk, arɛm bɛ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ mɛ́ngɔ́ɔ́ ndǔ ɛjuri, nɛ ɛbhak nɔ. Nkúbhɛ́ Mandɛm kɛ ákʉ́ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ ɛbhi bɛ́ghɔ̀ amɛm batɨ yɛsɛ. Nɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛsí Kristo nɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ nɛ́nɛ ɛnyǔ bɛdiɛ́rɛ́ Mandɛm bɛchi.
Mmu Israɛl amɔt anɛ áká nnyɛ́n bɛ Apólos atwɔ́ Ɛ́fɛsɔs. Ɛtɔk nɛbhe ɛyi ɛ́bhák Aleksándriya. Yi achí nyaka mmu anɛ árɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛrɛm kɛpɨ nɛ arɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm sayri.
Ɛnyu yɔ nkwɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nyaka nɛ Yesu. Aghɔ̌ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri, agu chi nɛfí, puyɛ̌ amɛm ɛtɔk. Akʉ nɔ bɛ manoŋ mi ankʉ bo mámbák nyáŋá.
Tɔ́ŋ yɛ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn. Fíɛ́ bhɔ́ ntɨ nɛ ghatí bhɔ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bhap. Kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm áchyɛ́ wɔ mɛnkɛm. Ɔ́kɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ámbyák wɔ.
Mandɛm atɔ̌ŋ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ́ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ átó Njaŋa Mɔ́ywi fá amɨk bɛ sɛ́mfʉ́ɛ́t ntá yi sɛ́mbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.
Ɛta, mɛ̌yáŋ bɛ bɔ́ nkwɔ, bǒ ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mámbák nɛ mɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛnchí, bɛ́ mángɔ́ kɛnókó ɛkɛn ɔ́chyɛ́ mɛ mbɔnyunɛ ɔkɔŋ mɛ tɛ mpok ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ re ghoko mmɨk.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ bɔ bárɔ́ŋɔ́, bátwɔ̀ chi nɛ mɛnɛmɛ nɛ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ.
Sɛ́ghɔ bɛ sɛbhɔŋ mǔngo bachiǎkap anɛ ákó áchí amfay nɛ Mandɛm. Yí chí Yesu, Mmɔ Mandɛm. Sɛ́ndɔ́k yɛ ambɨ bɛkɛm sayri mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́nókó ɛ̌ti yi.
Mpok Mandɛm mmu achi Ɛta átɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnɛ́m ɛki nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, sɛbhak arɛ nɛ Yesu. Sɛ́ghók ndu Mandɛm mmu acha mankɛm árɛ̀m bɛ, “Nɛ́ chi Mɔ́wa. Nkɔŋ yi tontó. Ǎchyɛ̀ mɛ bɛyǎ kɛnókó.”
Nkúbhɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchyɛ akap anɛ ankɛm. Yí ǎchyɛ akap ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu mbɔ ɛnyu yí áyàŋ.

Ángɛl anɛ ájwí manwi afe ayi mmbá nɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ mmok ɛ́mɔt ndu bɛrat, ɛrɔp chi pyɔɔ. Ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ ntaŋ ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛrat ɛrɔp chi pyɔɔ. Ndǔ amɔt ndǔ barǔ mambe arat árɔ́p chi pyɔɔɔ. Ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ nywɔp ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛrat ɛ́rɔp chi pyɔɔ. Ɛ́bhak ɛnyumɔt nɛ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ bɛti ɛ́mɔt.
Bafu nɔkɔ, bakɛm Sɔstɛ́nes mmu anɛ achi nyaka mǔnti ɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛyɔ bádɛ́n nɛfí acha manyé. Yɛ̌ nɔ, Galío akɛ fyɛ́ ntí arɛ́.
Bápɛt babho bɛyaŋ mbi ndu bɛkɛm yi, afori bɔ́ amɔ arɔk ɛbhakayi.
Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́rɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, sɛ́pu fɛrɛ amɔ. Yɛ̌ndu bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn nkwɔmʉɛt mɛ́mày mɛ́ndɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, Mandɛm ǎkʉ̀ sɛmbɔŋ nɔkɔ bɛtaŋ bɛkɔ amɛm batɨ ayɛsɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nywɔp.
María asɔt ɛsáyrí ɛ́kpɛ́mɛ́ bawɛrɛ́riɛp amɛn áyá nkáp apɨkɨri bɛkak Yesu, antɛsɛ nɔkɔ nɛ ɛmɛnɛ́ntí yi. Ɛkɛt ɛnkɛm ɛ́jwi nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛriɛbhɛ́ bawɛrɛ mɔ.

Nɛka ɛni kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi achɔkɔ atú anɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ yi. Abhak arɛ́, achɔkɔ ndu bɛ́tɛ́m mbɔ bɛ achi chi kɛnkɔ. Ɛnyumɔt, mɔ́ywi Áisek, nɛ ɛbhárɛ́ mɔ́ywi Jekɔ́p, bo Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ mmɨk yɔ nkwɔ, báchɔ́kɔ ndu bɛ́tɛ́m nɛ yi Ábraham.
Bɔ̌ma, Koŋó nɔ́kɔ́ ká ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛya nɛ fyɛ́ ká amɨ́k amʉɛt bo abhɛn bákòŋo bɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛbhɛsɛ. Bǎrɨŋɨ ndǔ bɛpɨŋ ɛbhɛsɛ bɛchi nyaka mpok sɛ́chí awu nɛ bhe.
Pɔkɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batu batɨ. Mbák mǎnkʉ nɔ, nɔ bábhʉ̀rɛ ɛbhé Kristo.
Bě babhɔŋ bǎkwáy yɛ́ bɛ́ghɔ bɛ́ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛn mmu ákʉ̀ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ánsɔ́t yí mbɔ mmu anɛ áchí chak bɛsí bhi. Púyɛ chí nɛrɛm yí árɛ̀m nɛ nyu bɛ́ áká nɛ Mandɛm.
Ndu ɛchi nɔ, chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi? Bɛ́ Mandɛm apu chak ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀ kɛ? Wáwák!
Sɔt ka bǒnkwɔ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́re sɛnɛ ndǔ baraká Mandɛm amʉɛt. Kɛ bǎkɛ́ kɛ́m ɛpʉ́ítí nɛ bhɔ ɛ̌ti ayap nkaysi.
Nɛnu nɛ́kwɛ́n amfay. Máykɛl nɛ bɔángɛl abhɛn bachi antɛn yi báre nu nɛ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ nɛ bɔángɛl abhɛn bákòŋo yi.
Mbák mmu ywɛka aběntɨ, ákɛ́ rɔ bɛběntɨ bhi mɛnto yi ndǔ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ákɛ́ bhʉɛrɛ bɛběntɨ antɨ ndǔ nywɔp nɛnkɛm.
Yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ́ kɛmɛ bɛbʉ́ amfǎy bɛbʉ́. Mbák mu asɔk wɔ, ɔ́kɛ́ sɔk yi. Kɛ nɨkmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ankʉ yi bɛrɨ. Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ wɔ́ chi bɛ ɔ́mbak nɔ bɛ́ yi anjɛt wɔ.
Nɛ yí mmú átó mɛ, achi nɛ mɛ. Abhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ mɛ mbak awanti mbɔnyunɛ mɛ́kʉ̀ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́.”

Ndu ɛchi nɔ, dɔ́k ká ambɨ bɛte kpɨrí. Tɛtɛp anɛ bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ ámbák mbɔ mgbat anɛ ákɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋí nɛnu ɛbhɛka. Kʉ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛchi mbɔ nkú bɛsé anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu afyɛ́ ndu bɛkuti mbeápak ɛyi.

Mbák chi ɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ́ bhɛ́sɛ́ ɛnɛ ɛyɨŋɨ mambe tándrámɔt anɛ ɔ́ghɔ́ ndǔ awɔ́nɛm awa nɛ mɛnyɨŋ gol tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́, dɨŋɨ́ bɛ́ mambe tándrámɔt chí bɔángɛl tándrámɔt abhɛn bábhàbhɛri bɛka bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ tándrámɔt chí bɛká bǒnkwɔ tándrámɔt bhɔ.
Kɛ sɛ́ghɔ̀ Yesu mmu bákʉ́ bɔángɛl máncha yi ndǔ mɔ́mbɨŋɨ mpok. Báchyɛ́ yi kɛnɛ́m nɛ kɛnókó mbɔ mfɔ ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri nɛwú. Chi ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm kɛ yi ágú ɛ̌ti bo mankɛm.
Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ bhe mpoknkɛm nɛ ǎkwàk bhe bɛ mǎmbɔ́ŋ ntɨ bɛ́ghok yi, anchyɛ nɔkɔ be bɛtaŋ bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi áyàŋ mǎnkʉ.
Ngátí bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ maŋák ama ámbák nɛ bhe, nɛ bɛ maŋák amɛka anjwi pɔɔt.
Mɛ Pɔ̌l kɛ nchí sɨŋ ɛkáti ɛnɛ. Nchí nkʉbɛtɨk Mandɛm nɛ mǔnto Yesu Kristo. Mandɛm mmú ápɛmɛ bhɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo mmu sɛ́bháká ntɨ nɛ yi ndu nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ kɛ bátó mɛ.

Nchi yaŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ baghɔrɛ́ mánsɔ́bhɛ́rí nɔ́kɔ́ mmʉɛt nɛ kɛnókó, mándɨŋɨ ndu báyàp ndɛn nɛ mámfyɛ yɔ sayri ɛnyu ɛnɛ ɛ́kwáy. Bákɛ́ ghoko batí ámbák yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyu nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ŋwaŋwaŋ arɛ́ kpaŋtí kpáŋtí nɛ bákɛ́ fyɛ ndɛn bɛyǎ nkáp.

Asɔt nnɨk aghoko ɛ́kpá, abho bɛ́bok bho nɛ yɔ, bɛ mámfú amɛm ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm. Akʉ ɛnyumɔt nɛ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, nɛ mpɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí arɛ́. Atakati bɛ́fɛ́mɛ́ bo abhɛn bákɔ̀ ɛsiɛ́ bakáp bɛwupsi, nɛ atakati bakáp ayap.

Sɛ́chí yɛ chí awɔ́-bɛtɨk Mandɛm. Aghókó bhɛsɛ, abhat nɛ Yesu Kristo, bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔ́kɔ́ chí bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ. Nɛ Mandɛm anáŋ átóŋtí nyaka bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ábhʉ́rɛ́ ntá yɛsɛ, bɛ sɛ́nkʉ nɔkɔ bhɔ.

Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, bǎkɛ́ bhak maknkay ndǔ bɛrɛm bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ntá yɛka. Bɛ́twɔ̀ chi mɛmɔ be mbák bǎsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Mandɛm tɛtɛp. Bákɛ́ sɔt bhɔ mbɔ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bábhɨ́kɨ́ re ghɔ kɛ bɛ́fàkari nɛ bhe.
Sɛ́ŋák, sɛ́ŋák tontó, sɛ́nchyɛ yi kɛnókó mbɔnyunɛ mpok nɛbhay Mɔ́nkwɔmɛn akway, nɛ ngɔrɛ́ ywi anáŋ atóŋtí mmʉɛt.

Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm apɛ́mɛ́ bhe. Bɛrɨŋɨ nɔ ǎbhák ndǔ nkaysi ayɛka mbɔ kɛndɛ́n anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu ákùti ntí ywi nɛ yɔ. Sɔt ka nkwɔ́ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ áchyɛ́ bhe mbɔ akparɛnja nsɛm ɛpay anɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu.
Ághɔ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ndǔ mmu Íjip ádɛ̀n mmu Israɛl amɔt, arɔk bɛkwak yi. Akɛmɛ kɛ́mbé, kpát awáy mmu Ijip wu.
Bɔ̌ma, kɛ mbák chi bhe, bǎkɛ́ pɔp bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ.
Bák ká pě, mǎnte kpirí ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛka nɛ Yesu. Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛtaŋántɨ, mánte sɛnɛ́.

Bǎpɔkɔ nyaka ɛ́tɛm ɛnɛ́ mandɛm nsé anɛ áká nyɛ́n bɛ Mɔ́lɔk. Nɛ nɛmbe ɛnɛn mandɛm nsé Ráfan. Nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǎghókó ndu bɛchyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, chɔŋ mfɛ́rɛ́ be ntó ɛtɔk ɛ́chák bɛfʉɛt Bábilɔn.’
Bɔ̌ma, tě yɛka kpirí, mǎndɔk ambɨ mɛnoko mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́tɔ́ŋ be mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe nɛ ɛbhɛn sɛ́sɨ́ŋɨ́ amɛm bɛkáti ɛbhɛn sɛ́tó ntá yɛka.
Mbɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ̌ ákʉ́ sɛ́mbák bo abhɛn sɛ́kwày bɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ. Achyɛ́ bhɛsɛ́ Ɛfóŋó ɛyi mbɔ nkɛm bɛ́ chɔŋ anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt nkɔ yɔ nkwɔ tɛtɛp.
Ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛ́chɔ́kɔ kpák ámbɔ́ŋ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt, antá batu ndu bɛghok mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ amɛm ɛkɛt Mandɛm.
Mbák bǒ nkwɔ́ mándɛ́m bɛ́ mǔnti akʉ ndak, kɛ́tɨŋɨ ka, kpatɛ batísiɛ mámfú mbɔ batí ápay nɛ arat.
Kaká ká batɨ sayri nɛ ɛkɔŋ Mandɛm. Bakwɔ́ bho Kristo mankɛm bátò bhe bakak.

Chɔŋ mandi kɛbhɔ mánto nɔkɔ mfok antí bɛtɔ́ŋ kɛbhɔ ɛkɛn kɛchi bhɔ antɨ. Chɔŋ mandi nɔkɔ bɛ, ‘Ɛrɛm ɛtɔk, ɛbɛp ntá yɛ ɛcha. Ɛtɔk ɛnɛ kɛ ɛ́kʉ́ bǒbhɛn babhɔŋɔ bakáp. Ndǔ mɔ́nɛŋɔkɔ́ nywɔp amɔt, ɛ́rɔŋ ɛnkɛm!
Ghɔ́ ká ndu Ɛtayɛsɛ áre kɔŋ bhɛsɛ. Akɔŋ bhɛsɛ́ tontó kpát ǎbhɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ bɛ bɔ̌bhi, nɛ sɛchi bɔ̌bhi tɛtɛp. Ntí anɛ bǒ mmɨk babhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bɔ̌ Mandɛm chi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm.

Bě bɛsakábho nɛ baghɔsɔ́ŋ, bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt ntá bǒ batɨ́ bhɛka. Bɔ́ŋ ká nɛsɛptímʉɛt nɛ batɨ. Nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt nɛ́mbák ntá yɛka mbɔ nkú anɛ mmu afyɛ́ amʉɛt. Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mandɛm apú chyɛ mbi ntá mmu anɛ áyòŋmʉɛt, kɛ ǎtɔ̀ŋ bɛrɨ̌ndu ntá bo abhɛn básɛptimʉɛt amɨk.”

Wáwák! Yɛ̌ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achi nsěnse, Mandɛm ákʉ̀ chi ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Ɔ̌tɔ̀ŋ kpoŋoroŋ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɔ́rɛ̀m bɛ ɔchí chak, nɛ mpok bákpɔt manyé yɛ, bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛpu bhak nɛ wɔ.”
Bǒbatí bachiǎkap Mandɛm báchyɛ́ yí bɛtaŋ, nɛ atwɔ fá chi bɛ́kɛmti bǒbhɛ.”

Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé báchi nyaka nɛntɨ bǒ Mandɛm. Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛchi ɛchɔŋ bɛ batɔŋɔ́ nsé bábhɔŋ bɛbhesi nɛntɨ ɛnɛka mántɔŋ nɔkɔ be baraká nsé ɛ̌ti Mandɛm nɛ bapu ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ ɛ́twɔ̀ bhɔ chi nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Bátɔ̀ŋ nɛ mánìsi bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛtayap mmu ákú bhɔ́ áfɛ́rɛ́ ndǔ kɛsɛm. Nɛ ndu bákʉ̀ nɔ, ngwɛnti yap ǎbɛ́p ancha.

Ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu árɛ́mɛ́, bo Israɛl bápɛ́t báre yaŋ mbi bɛway yi. Ntí abhak bɛ, puyɛ̌ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛ akwɛn ɛbhé nywɔbhɛ́ nɛywěmʉɛt, kɛ ndak anɛ́ akpɨk ábɛ́bhɛ́ áchá ábhák bɛ, yí ǎbhɨ̀ŋɨ Mandɛm bɛ ɛtayi, nɛ bɛ bɛ́kʉ nɔ chi bɛyɛnti mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm.
Nchí bɨ́tí bhe tontó bɛ́ bǎkaysi mɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ nɛ bǎkòŋo sayri mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ntɔ́ŋɔ́ bhe.
Mfɔ Debhít asɨŋ nyaka ɛ̌ti yi bɛ, “Nchí ghɔ nyaka Acha mpoknkɛm bɛsí bha, abhak ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛya, bɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛkɛ nyɨkɨsi mɛ.

Nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ fu chi ntá bachi nɛ manɔ abhɛka bo bapɛm ayap áfʉɛrɛ fʉɛt. Mandɛm asɔt chi Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi kɛ ǎchyɛ bhe nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn, nɛ nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti mbɔnyunɛ nɛ́fǔ ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ ɛyi ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m, nɛ ɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
Su nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ ká bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛká ntá batɨ, mǎnɨk nɔkɔ mmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ámbú bo abhɛn mámè. Nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt mmu anɛ áchí chak bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ́bhɔŋ bɛyǎ bɛtaŋ.
Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ anoko ǎbhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
Yesu arɔk ambɨ bɛrɛm bɛ, “Nnáŋ ndɔ́k, mpú rɔ mǎmbák mbɔ bɔ̌bɛrǎ. Chɔŋ mpɛtnsɛm ntá yɛka.
Mɛnkɛm bɛ́kwàk ndǔ bɛyǎ babhi. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛnɛ ɛkwak mmu anɛ achi mmu Israɛl chi bɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛyi amɔ ayap.

Basɛm, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛ́ghok mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ yi fá amɨk sayri. Chiɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ka bhɔ kɛnókó nɛ bɛchǎy nɛ nɛwɛrɛ́mʉɛt nɛ mǎnkʉ nɔ́kɔ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛka nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bághòk Kristo.

Kɛ chi bɛ ɔ̌sɔ̀t bɛyǎ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ, nɛ nɛghɔ́ anɛ yi ághɔ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́kʉ̀ mbɔ bɛ apú ghɔ, nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ́ ɛyi mbɔ ɛráká ndak? Ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔ bɛ ntí anɛ Mandɛm átɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ chi bɛkwak bhɛsɛ sɛntɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ?
Nɛ mpok sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt sɛ́pú makati mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ, ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ yɔ mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́yàŋ ɛ́kɔ ndɔ́ŋ amɔt nɛ nkaysi yi.

Mɛ̌nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm mmu ákʉ̀ bɛ bo mámbáká ntɨ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ, ánkʉ́ bɛ batɨ yɛka ánjwí nɛ maŋák nɛ kpák ndǔ mǎnókó yi. Ɛnyu ɛyɔ, bǎkway bɛrɔŋ ambɨ bɛbhaka ntɨ nɛ yi ndǔ bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ tontó tonto.
Mɔ́nkɨ áchi nyaka ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ bágó Yesu ndǔ ɛkotákátí. Nnɛm nɛkɔ nɛ́bhák arɛ ɛnɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ re bhɛmɛ yɛ̌ ngú amɔt amɛm.

Bákɛ́m nnya mbʉ́mbʉ yɔ nɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé mmu ákʉ̀ nyaka mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay bɛsí nnya mbʉ́mbʉ. Ɛnyu yɔ̌ kɛ̌ yi árwɔ bho, báká bɛ mámfyɛ́ bhɔ ɛrɨ̌ŋ ɛnɛ́ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ amʉɛt nɛ báchyɛ́ ntí ako yi kɛnókó. Bakɛm nɔkɔ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ nɛ ndɛmɛkɛpɨ̌ntɨ nsé bágʉ́ɛp bhɔ, amík anti fúú, amɛm nɛpǐngo anɛ ádù nɛ sɔ́lfɔ.

Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ chi bɛkoŋo ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mbák nsay ǎnù mǔmpap aywɛ, chyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́. Mbák manyiɛp ǎkwàk yi, chyɛ yi manyiɛp ányú. Mbák bǎkʉ̀ nɔ, ɛ́bhak mbɔ bɛ bǎtò kɛfɨkɨsǐ ngó anti mǔmpap aywɛ, nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ mǔmpap ámbɔ́ŋ ntíánwɔ́p.”

Dɔ̌ ká Ɛyɔŋ Kristo ɛ́mbɔŋ bɛtaŋ amɛm batɨ ayɛka. Tɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká batɨ ɛkɔŋ ɛyɔ, mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bhɔ maniɛ́, nɛ bɛyǎ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka bakwáy anɛ áfù ndu Ɛkáti Bakway ɛnɛ ɛchi amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm, nɛ bakwáy Mandɛm achak, nɛ bakwáy anɛ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afyɛ́ be antɨ. Kwáy nɔ́kɔ́ ka yɔ nɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm amɛm batɨ yɛka.
Manɛ́m, kɔŋ ka baghɔrɛ́ bhɛka, nɛ bǎkɛ́ bhak bɛbebɛbe nɛ bhɔ.

Mbák ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ánókó abhɔŋ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ ndǔ nnɛrɛ́kɛt ywi, ánkwak bhɔ́. Ákɛ́ rɔ ntǔ wap ntá bakoŋo Yesu báchák. Mbák mánkʉ nɔ, nkwɔ́ Yesu bábhɔŋ mbi bɛ́kwak mánkwɛ́sɛ́ abhɛn kɛbhɔ́ŋ nɛkwak.
Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi chi bɛ yí áchyɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chi ntá Mɔ́ywi.
Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm, ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Nɛ mmu anɛ abhɨkɨ bhat mmʉɛt nɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɔ.
Mbák yɛ mbɔ̌ŋ mmɔ́ amfɛrɛ be ndǔ kɛsɛm, chɔŋ mǎmbak ngǎngaŋ tɛtɛp.
Ndu ɛchi nɔ, nchí ghati bhe bɛ bǎkɛ́ fɛrɛ amɔ ɛ̌ti bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛ̌ghɔ̀ ɛ̌ti yɛka ndu bɛkwak bhe.
Mɛnyǔ bǒbhɔ bapu kʉ chi bɛtɨk Acha Kristo. Bákʉ̀ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ babhɔŋ bakɔŋɔ. Nɛ básɔ̀t chi sɛ́rwɔ́rɛ́nyu nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bɛrwɔ bo abhɛn amɨ́k ayap ábhɨ́kɨ́re nɛ́nɛ.

Batɨ yap ájwí nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ndak abʉ́abʉ mbɔ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ nɛ bɛfyɛ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ bo bachak, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛyaŋ bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́, nɛ mpabhamɨ́k, nɛ bɛway bho, nɛ bɛtaŋa ɛbhɛn mmu ábhɔ̀ŋ nɛ batɨ ndu áyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ bhɔ, nɛ bɛrwɔ bho, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́, nɛ ɛnáŋtí.
Ndǔ bɛtaŋá Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmú achí nɛ bhɛsɛ, kɛ́m Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ anɛ báfyɛ wɔ amɔ sayri.
Mmu anɛ ápɨ́ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchyɛ mmʉɛt yi maŋák, ǎghɛm chi nɛwú. Kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ankʉ ǎghɛm nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ mɛ́mɔ́ Acha mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk ɛyap bákʉ̀ nyaka, ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm ató nnyɔ́, nɛ nnyɔ́ ɛre waytí bɔ́.

Mbák mmu akɔŋ bo apú yoŋ mmʉɛt, apú kʉ barak ntíánwɔ́p, apú yɨŋɨ chi ndiɛrɛ mmʉɛt yi. Apú kaysi chí ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛkwak yímbɔŋ, apú wakari bɛbent, apú fyɛ bo antɨ mbák bákʉ yi bɛbʉ́.

Ngɛ́mtay ɛ́bhɔ́ŋ ɛnyɨŋ ambeápak mbɔ ndɛ́-nɛnu anɛ bághókó nɛ ɛse, ndu bɛkuti mbeápak nɛ ɛwat ɛnɛ ɛ́fù ndǔ bɛbhap ɛbhap ɛbhak mbɔ bɛrɛmti ɛbhɛn bɛ́fù ndu bɛ́kárɨ́k ɛbhɛn mpɔŋɔ́ndɨk ɛnɛ́ ɛ́rɔ̀ŋ ɛbhɨ̌nɛnu ntiɛ́t ntiɛt.
Mbɔ mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ́ ngátí bhɔ mɛnyɨŋ, mbʉ bákwáy bɛtaŋa mmʉɛt bɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ bɛbʉ́. Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bápú kway bɛtaŋa bɛ babhɨkɨ kʉ bɛbʉ́.
Ɛkaká nɛkɔ ɛyɛka ɛbhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi barɨŋɨ́ndak bɛsí bo abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ́ chɔŋti yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mpok anɛ bǎbhɔŋɔ mbi bɛghati bɔ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́.
Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ ɛchi nɛ́nɛ mbɔ bɛ bágo nyaka nɛpɛ́m nɛsɨ́ ɛnɛsɛ ndu ɛkotákátí nɛ yi, bɛ Mandɛm anchɔŋti mmʉɛt bɛbʉ́ ayɛsɛ bɛ sɛkɛ pɛrɛ bhak ndu kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́.

Ghɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨŋɨ bo abhɛn bachi bɔ̌ Mandɛm nɛ abhɛn bachi bɔ̌ Satan nɔ. Yɛ̌ agha anɛ ápú kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm apú mmɔ́ Mandɛm. Ɛchi ɛnyumɔ́t nɛ mmǔ anɛ abhɨkɨ kɔŋ ntɨ.
Mmu anɛ akaysi chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyàŋ bɛkʉ achí mǔmpap Mandɛm. Apú sɛptimʉɛt bɛkoŋo bɛbhé Mandɛm, nɛ apú kway bɛkʉ nɔ wáwák.
Ntǐ ɛna nɛ́jwi yɛ nɛ maŋák, nɛ nchí rɛm kɛpɨ nɛ maŋák. Nɛ mbákántɨ chí nɛ Mandɛm,

Wáwák! Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌yàŋ bɛkʉ mǎndɨ́ŋɨ́ chí bɛ akap anɛ́ bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ Mandɛm báchyɛ̀, báchyɛ̀ chí ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, puyɛ̌ chí ntá Mandɛm. Nɛ mpú yáŋ mǎnchɛ́m mmʉɛt nɛ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.

Barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ batɔŋ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm báchi nyaka ndǔ Nkwɔ Yesu abhɛn Antiɔk. Bábhak Banábas, nɛ Símiɔn anɛ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Ɛgírímɔ, nɛ Lusiɔs anɛ áfú Sírene, nɛ Manáen anɛ áchí nyaka mmʉɛrɛ kɛmbɔ́ anɛ Mfɔ Hɛ́rɔd Ántipas, nɛ Sɔ̌l.
Bǎkɛ́ ka yɛ bɛ mmu ánsɔ́t bɛyɔŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi fuu andwɔ̀ bhe. Dɨŋɨ́ ká bɛ mɛnyǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ kɛ bɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ambentɨ, nɛ chɔŋ antɛmsi bo abhɛn bapu ghok yi.

Ɔ́bhɔ̌ŋ bɛkʉ bǒbhɔ́ mánchók manyu yap. Bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bábhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ bɛtɔŋ, mánchɔŋti nɔkɔ batí bo mankɛm ndǔ mbɔk manɛrɛ́kɛt bɛ mándɔ́ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu. Bákʉ̀ nɔ, chi bɛsɔt bakáp ntá bho, ɛnɛ́ ɛyɔ chí ɛnyɨŋɨ́ ntíánwɔ́p.
Yesu anáŋ arɨ́ŋɨ́ nyaka mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛti yi. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ yi árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Puyɛ̌ be mankɛm kɛ bǎchí pɛ́pɛ́p.”
Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ ápú fʉɛ́t ndǔ nnyǔbha ánchwe ndǔ nkwɔ bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n, kɛ ǎko chí ɛbhak ɛ́chák anchwe amɛm, chí ngɛ́p. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, chí ngɛ́bhɛ́ ntantaŋ.
Bárɔ mbi anɛ achi chak, mánɛ́m ɛbhɨ. Bákʉ̀ chi mbɔ Bálam, Mmɔ Boas ákɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛ́kʉ bɛbʉ́ bɛ ámbɔ́ŋ nsáy-nkáp,
Mbɔk bo Israɛl nɛ abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl báchɛ́m nɛ bǒ batí bhap báká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt bɛ mánchyɛ bǒnto Yesu ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ bɛ mantɛmti bhɔ nɛ batay mángwáy.

Bɛ́jwí ndɔŋ ɛ́rát, Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ?” Píta abé ntɨ mbɔnyunɛ Yesu ábhɛp yi ɛnyɨŋ ɛrɛ ɛ́mɔt ndɔŋ ɛ́rát. Ɛ́kʉ, aghati Yesu bɛ, “Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ne bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n aya.
Kɛ yɛ̌ ɛ́bɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́pú chwe arɛ. Bo abhɛn bákʉ̀ barak abʉ́abʉ nɛ basěnse bápu chwe arɛ́. Bo abhɛn báchwe arɛ chi bo abhɛn básɨ́ŋɨ́ manyɛ́n ayap amɛm ɛkáti nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛn.
Ngɔrɛ́ wu asɔbhɛri mmʉɛt nɛ ndɛn ɛnɛ ɛchi chuu, ɛnyǔ ndɛn ɛnɛ bafɔ báfyɛ, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ pú, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ nkáp, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛfyɛ ɛmɨ ɛbhɛn bághókó nɛ bɔ̌batay bɛyǎ nkáp abhɛn bábhɨŋɨ bɛ pɛ́l.
Nɛ nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛtɔŋ batɨ chi bɛkɔŋ bhɔ. Ɛkɔŋ ɛ́gwɔ̀t mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm ndǔ nsoŋ amɔt.
Yesu akɛmɛ bhɔ bɛ, “Mpok akway anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ́ Mmu anɛ áfú ntá yi kɛnókó.
Bě bo bǎrɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛkwɛn bɛrwɔp,” Bě babhɔŋ bǎpú kwɛn bɛrwɔbhɛ? Bě bo bǎre pap baraká bɔmandɛm nsé, bǎpú ghɛp mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi amɛm bɛkɛrɛ́ bɔmandɛm nsé?
Kɛ ɛbhé ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ́ nyaka mfyɛ́ ngoŋo ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bho mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Mbák ɛbhé ɛ́pú, bɛbʉ́ bɛ́bhàk chi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́gú.
Chɔŋ mbak ɛkuti ɛyɛ mpoknkɛm, nɛ bǒbhɛ bápú kway bɛkʉ wɔ yɛ̌nyɨŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ chí bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl. Nchí to wɔ ntá yap nɛ́nɛ.

Ghatí bhɔ́ ɛnyu yɔ́ mbɔnyunɛ ndǔ mpok anɛ áfúɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bɛsɛ babhɔŋ sɛ́chí nyaka amɨ́k nɛ́mɛ́ nɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ baraka Mandɛm. Sɛ́tàŋ nyaka ntí. Nɛ bo bárwɔ̀ nyaka bhɛsɛ sɛ́nkʉ́ nɔkɔ bɛbʉ́. Sɛ́bhák ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ ɛ́nŋwaka bɛ́ sɛ́nkʉ. Sɛ́kaysi nyaka bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́chyɛ̀ bhɛsɛ maŋák. Sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka bɛbʉ́ nɛ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ mpap amɨ́k. Bo bápàp nyaka bhɛsɛ, bɛsɛ́ nkwɔ sɛ́mpap nɔkɔ batɨ.
Bɛsí Mandɛm nɛ Yesu Kristo nɛ bɔángɛl Mandɛm, nchí ghati wɔ bɛ ɔ́mbʉ́rɛ́ bɛbhé ɛbhɛn sayri, ɔkɛ́ tɔ́ŋ kɛnkábhɛ́ nɛ kɛ́rɨ́ŋámík.
Bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ nɛsɨkɨ ntɨ ɛnɛka. Nɛ́twɔ nɛ bɛyǎ nsáy.
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí arɛ́ chí bɛ mǔbɛtɨk anɛ báfyɛ́ yí ɛnyɨŋ awɔ́ bɛ́ ánkɛ́m sayri, abhɔŋ bɛtɔŋ chi-bɛtɨk aywi bɛ́ yí achí mmǔ tɛtɛp.
Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛchɔkɔ Jopa ndǔ bɛyǎ manywɔp nɛ ngoko nkwɔbhɛ́nya ɛnɛ bághárɛ́ amʉɛt nnya ɛnɛ baway. Nnyɛ́n ɛni nɛ́bhak bɛ Símun.
Bě bakoŋo Yesu bǎrɨ́ŋɨ́ sayri bɛ́ bǎchí mbɔ ɛkɛrákap Mandɛm nɛ bɛ́ Ɛfóŋó Mandɛm achí nɛ bhe.
Bɔ̌ma, tɛ̌ndu manoŋ Yesu árɔ́ŋɔ́ amɨk ɛ̌ti yɛsɛ, sɛ́kway yɛ bɛrɛm bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ bɛchwe ndǔ nɛbhʉɛ́t anɛ achi Nyáŋá.
Yesu apɛt aghati bhɔ bɛ, “Nchí rɔ bhe, bɛ́rɔŋ. Nnáŋ ndɔ́k, chɔŋ mǎnjaŋ mɛ. Kɛ bǎgu chɔŋ ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bǎpú kwáy bɛ́twɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ mɛ́rɔ̀ŋ.”
Mandɛm ayap be bɛ mǎmbak bǒbhi, bǎchi nyáŋá, nɛ akɔŋ be tontó. Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎbhɔŋ bɛghɔ batɨ ntínso, mǎntɔŋ bɔ bɛrɨ̌ntɨ nɛ nɛsɛptǐmʉɛt, nɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛsɔt mɛnyɨŋ pɛtii, nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ.
Mmu anɛ áká bɛtok mɛ, abhɔŋ bɛ́kóŋo mɛ. Nɛ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ mɛ̌bhák, arɛ́ kɛ̌ nkʉbɛtɨk awa ábhák nkwɔ. Mbák mmu ántók mɛ, Ɛtaya ǎkʉ yi ambɔŋ kɛnókó.”
Mmǔ ntí bo Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmu anɛ ákɛ̀m ɛfo yi sayri, ankʉ bɔ̌bhi mámbak bo abhɛn bághòk yí mánchyɛ nɔkɔ bo kɛnókó ndu yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
Ndu ɛ́chí nɔ, fyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ́ka batɨ ntɨ mǎnkwak nɔkɔ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎkʉ̀ nɔ.
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghókó tɛ nɛbhǒnɛt chi bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ batɨ.
Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́chí ndǔ mpok anɛ, nchí rɛm bɛ́ mmu anɛ áchí ndǔ mmʉɛt mmʉɛt ɛyi, ámbák mbɔ ɛnyǔ áchí.
Mǔnti bo Israɛl amɔt achi nyaka. Aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Nikɔdɛ́mɔs. Abhak mǔnkwɔ Fárisi.

Nkúbhɛ́ ɛnyu yɔ kɛ ɛ́chí nyaka nɛ Ráhab, ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yí ákʉ́ kɛ̌ Mandɛm ághɔ́, asɔt bɛ́ yí achí chak bɛsí bhi. Nɔ́ chí, Ráhab asɔt baghokotǐ kɛpɨ abhɛn báfú Israɛl abhɛsɛ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi, achyɛ bhɔ́ maniɛ́. Báfʉɛ́t yɛ́ mbi áchák bápɛtnsɛm Israɛl kɛbhɔ́ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri.

Yɛ̌ nɔ, chɔŋ Mandɛm ampɛmɛ baghɔrɛ́ bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛbhé anɛ bɔ́ bábhè bɔ, nɛ mbák bapu tɔŋ mmʉɛt, nɛ mbák bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɔ bɛsɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ Kristo, nɛ mbák bárɔ̀ŋ ambɨ bɛkɔŋ bɛtɨ̌ bakwaŋwaŋ, nɛ mbák báchi nyáŋá ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛnap, kɛbhɔŋ bɛkwɛnɛ.
Mandɛm bo Israɛl ayap nyaka bachǐmbɨ bhɛsɛ́ akʉ nnɛrɛ́kɛt bǒ bhɛsɛ áchɨk mpok báchí mankɔ amɛm ɛtɔk Íjip. Mandɛm afɛrɛ bhɔ́ ndu kɛsɛm arɛ́ nɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi ɛbhɛn bɛyǎ bɛcha.
Nɛ Mandɛm mmu arɨŋɨ batɨ bo mankɛm, atɔŋ kpóŋóróŋ bɛ́ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bákway mɛ́nóko nkwɔ. Akʉ nɔ́ ndu áchyɛ́ bhɔ́ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyu yi achyɛ nyaka bhɛsɛ.

Ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm mmu árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ kwɛn bɛrwɔp”. Nkúbhɛ́ yí kɛ árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, “Ɔ́kɛ́ wáy”. Ɛyɔ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ yɛ bɛ́ mbák ɔ́ngwáy mmu, nɔ́ ɔ́kwɛ̌n ɛbhé Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu ɔ́bhɨ́kɨ́ kwɛ́n bɛrwɔp.
Nɛ nchí chyɛ yɔ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Ápú gú ánɛ́m. Mmu apú anɛ ákwày bɛ́fɛrɛ yɔ́ amɔ́ya.
Mandu mpok, chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu áchyɛ̀ kpák anchyɛ bhe awɔ́nɛm amfay Satan mpok bǎyátí yi amɨk. Nchí nɨkmʉɛt bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Yesu Kristo Acha mɛ́mbak nɛ bhe.
Mpok ɛyɔ chɔŋ bo mánde kɔt ngɛpti bɛ báchi bo Mandɛm yɛ̌ndu bábhɨkɨ noko bɛ́ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ bɛ́kʉ bɔ́ mámbak bǒbhi. Kɛ́chɛm ɛkak nɛ mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ.
Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ɛchi nɛ bhɛsɛ. Yɛ̌ndu sɛ́yá, sɛ́chí mbɔ mmʉɛt amɔt mbɔnyunɛ sɛ́chɛm mmʉɛt nɛ Kristo. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achi nɛ batɨ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛpókómʉɛt ɛchi nɛ bɛchak.
Mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́bhɛn ngátí nɛ́ wɔ bɛ́chí tɛtɛp. Nchi yaŋ yɛ bɛ ɔ́ngáti bo abhɛn mánoko Mandɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sayri bɛ mámfyɛ́ ntí bɛ́kʉ bɛrɨ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ tontó nɛ bɛ́kwàk yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ kɛ básɨ́ŋɨ amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm bɛ, “Ábraham anókó nyaka Mandɛm, ɛ́kʉ́ Mandɛm arɛm bɛ́ Ábraham achí chak bɛsí bhi, nɛ bo báré bhɨŋɨ Ábraham bɛ́ mmʉɛrɛ Mandɛm”.
Bɔ̌ma, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ mmu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ kɛnókó kɛnkɛm, bǎkɛ́ chyɛ kɛnókó ntá bo abhɛn bǎghɔ́ bɛ́ báchí sayri, mǎmbyak abhɛn ɛyap ɛ́pú.
“Ɛyɔŋɔ́nyu yap ɛ́nɛ̀m mbɔ ɛriɛp ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ nnɛm ɛnɛ́n ɛnɛ́n mánɛ́nɛ́, bárɔ́ fúú. Básɔ̀t bárɨ́ yap bɛrwɔ bho.” “Bɛyɔŋɔ́nyu bhap bɛ́wày mmu way mbɔ ɛfé mpok ɛ́nɛ́m mmu.”
Ɛnyu ɛyɔ nkwɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛ́m abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔ mmʉɛt yi. Mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi ǎkɔ̀ŋ chi mmʉɛt yi.

Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm bɛ yi ɛ̌ti barak anɛ? Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́rɛ̀m chi bɛ bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bábhɨ́kɨ́ fyɛ nyaka bɛtaŋ ndu bɛyaŋ mbi bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bábhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm bɛfʉɛt ndǔ nɛka ɛnɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Yesu.
Bábhɔŋ bɛ́kɛm nɛ bɛtaŋ mɛnyɨŋ bhɛ́sɛ bhɛ́sɛ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm ákʉ bo mándɨŋɨ nɛ mánóko. Babhɔŋ bɛkɛm bɔ nɛ ntɨ ɛnɛn nɛchi chak.

Abhɛ́n bachi bhap mánókó Yesu bákɛ́ rɔ bɛ́chyɛ bhɔ kɛnókó ɛkɛ́n kɛ́kwáy nɛ bhɔ nɛ bákɛ rɔ bɛghok bhɔ yɛ̌ndu bárɔ́bhɛ́ chí bǒ mmu amɔt. Ɛrɨ́ bɛ́ mántók bachi bhap sayri ɛ́ncha mbɔ̌ŋ ɛnyu ɛsɨ, mbɔnyunɛ bachi abhɛ́n bɔ́ bákwàk mánoko Yesu Kristo nɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɔ́. Tɔ́ŋ bo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn, ɔ́ngati bɔ́ mánkʉ bhɔ́.
Kɛ mbɔk yap bábhɨ́kɨ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ báfyɛ nyaka bariɛp nɛ Mandɛm bɛ babhɔŋ bɛkʉ chi bɛ Mandɛm apu pɛrɛ bhʉrɛ bariɛp ami kɛ?
Kɛ ntɛmɛ́ nɛnu amɔt asɔt nɛkɔŋ ayɛm Yesu ambeápak. Tɛ́mté wu, manoŋ nɛ manyiɛp abho bɛfu.
“Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nchí ghati bhe chi bɛ mankɔ́ŋ batɨ mbɔnyu nkɔ́ŋ be.

Yɛ̌ mmu ywɛka ákɛ chyɛ yɛ ɛpókómʉɛt ɛyi mbɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ básɔt bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ nɛ yɔ. Kɛ chyɛ̌ ka mmʉɛt ntá Mandɛm mbɔ bo abhɛn mánáŋ bágú kɛ yi ákʉ́ bǎpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m. Nɛ chyɛ ká bɛpókómʉɛt ɛbhɛka ntá Mandɛm mbɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn bǎsɔt bɛkʉ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
Kɛ mbák chi bɛsɛ, sɛ́pú bo abhɛn báyà mmʉɛt ansɛm mangu manɛm. Sɛ́chí chí bo abhɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ yi ǎpɛmɛ bhɛsɛ.”

Ɛ́náŋ ɛ́mfákárí ɛnyu ɛyɔ, Mandɛm ǎpɛmɛ bo Israɛl mankɛm. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Chɔŋ mmu amfú ɛtɔk Síɔn anɛ ǎfɛrɛ bo Mandɛm ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri. Chɔŋ yi amfɛrɛ ɛpɨŋ bɛ́byak Mandɛm amʉɛt bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ Jekɔ́p.”
Bo Israɛl bhɔ kɛ báwáy nyaka Yesu Acha nɛ barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bɔ́ kɛ báboko bhɛsɛ ɛtɔk. Bákʉ̀ ntɨ nɛ́mbé Mandɛm. Bachi bǒmpap ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu.
Mbák sɛ́nchók batú, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́náŋ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm, sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ yɛ̌ akap achak apu anɛ ákway bɛkʉti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ.
Ndu Mandɛm ábhárɛ́ bhɛsɛ nɛ Yesu Kristo, yí akʉ sɛ́pɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m nɛ yi. Nɛ akʉ sɛ́chɔ́kɔ́ nɛ Kristo amfay ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi achi Mfɔ.
Ndu ɛchi nɔ, dɔ̌ ká baraká nse. Bɛsɛ́ mankɛm sɛ́ndɛm nɔkɔ chi tɛtɛp nɛ batɨ, mbɔnyunɛ sɛchi mbɔ bɛpókómʉɛt nyáŋá nyáŋá ndǔ mmʉɛt amɔt.
Sɛ́kɛ chyɛ bhɔ mbi yɛ mandú. Sɛ́kɛ yáŋ bɛ bɔ manchɔŋti tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́, tɛ̌ndu bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛrɔŋ ambɨ mɛnoko yɔ.
Mmu anɛ árɛ̀m ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi ábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ, anɨ́kmʉɛt bɛ Mandɛm ánchyɛ́ yi akap mɛ́nɛ́nɛ́ nta bho ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ndǔ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk ɛnɛ yi abhɨkɨ rɨŋɨ.
Mpok ɛyɔ nkɛm, Sɔ̌l arɔk ambɨ bɛpa bɛ yi abhɔŋ bɛway bakoŋo Yesu. Arɔk ntá mǔngo bachiǎkap Mandɛm,
Nɛ́nɛ, nchí twɔ ntá yɛ, nɛ nchí rɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ndǔ mpok mbʉɛ́t fá amɨk, bɛ́ maŋák ama ámbák nɛ bhɔ.
Bɔ́ŋ nɔ́kɔ́ ká chi maŋák tɛ̌ndu bábhɔ̀ŋ ɛsɔŋɔri mbɔ Kristo ndǔ bǎchɛ́mɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ yi, bɛ́ be nkwɔ mǎnjwi nɛ maŋák mpok yi átwɔ nɛ kɛnɛ́m ɛki.
Njɨŋɨ sayri bɛghɔ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi arɛ. Ngɔ́ nnya mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu. Nnya ɛnɛ anywɔ́p nɛ nnya ɛbebe nɛ nnya ɛnɛ́ ɛ́sù mɛniɛ amɨk nɛ kɛnɛn.
Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ bɛběntɨ, nɛ ɛchoko-ntɨ, nɛ nkaysi bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́, nɛ bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛkɛ fu be anyu.
Babhɔ̌ŋ nyaka awɔ́-bɛtɨk ámɔ́t nɛ Pɔ̌l, nɔ́ chí bɛtɨk bɛ́ghóko bɛ́tɛm nɛ ndɛn. Pɔ̌l achɔkɔ nɛ bhɔ mángoko nɔkɔ bɛ́tɛm.
Bǎkɛ́ pɛrɛ rɔ yɛ bɛbʉ́ mɛ́mbɔ́ŋ bɛtaŋ ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛyɛka ɛnɛ ɛ́gùgu bɛkʉ be mǎnkoŋo nɔkɔ chi mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɔ ɛŋwaka bɛ mǎnkʉ.
Ndǔ nnyɛ́n Yesu Kristo Acha sɛ́ghàti mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ sɛ́njɛp nɔkɔ bhɔ batú bɛ mánkʉ ɛbhap bɛtɨk. Mándɔ́ bɛ́chyɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mánkʉ bɛtɨk ndu bɛbhɔŋ ɛnap nɛnyíɛ́.
“Bachǐmbɨ bhɔ bábhɔ́ŋ mpabhamɨ́k nɛ mɔ́máyap Josɛ́f. Bátǐ yi mbɔ nsɛm ntá bakɔ̌siɛ, Bɔ́ bárɔ́k ɛtɔk Íjip nɛ yi. Kɛ Mandɛm abhak nɛ yi,
Mmu wap amɔt áká nnyɛ́n bɛ́ Ágábɔs. Ndu bɛtaŋ Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ afate arɛm bɛ chɔŋ ɛrɛmɛ nsay ɛ́nkwɛ́n ndǔ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́chí antɛn Mfɔ Rom. [Nsay yɔ akwɛ́n mpok Klaodiɔs áchí Mfɔ Rom].
Pɔ̌l ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ bɛ́rɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, bɔ́ mankɛm bátɛp mánɛ́n amɨk, babho mɛnɨkmʉɛt.
Nɛ bo Yesu Kristo mánaŋ báfɛrɛ ntí ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ máŋwàka nyaka bɛkʉ. Ɛchi mbɔ bɛ bágo mmʉɛt nkwǎ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yɔ áyàŋ mmu ankʉ ndu ɛkotákátí.
Bɔ̌ma, yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyǔ ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ́ ɛ́tɛ́mɛ́rí mmu ywɛka ámbɔ́ŋ chi maŋák,
Mbák sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛ́bhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm, kɛ sɛ́nkɔ nɔkɔ amɛm ɛjuri, nɔ sɛ́sè chi nsé, nɛ sɛpu koŋo tɛtɛp anɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́.
Aghɔ́ bɛ́ nɛbu nɛ́nɛ́nɛ. Ɛnyɨŋɨ́fú ɛ́fú arɛ ɛre sɛp amɨk. Ɛ́bhak mbɔ ntěndɛn nɛgho ɛnɛ́n bákɛ́mɛ́ ndǔ batí yi anwi básɛ̀bhɛ amɨk.

Sɛ́fǔ bɛtɔk nyáŋá nyáŋá: Mbɔk báfu Pátia, báchák Mídia, abhɛ́nɛ́fú Ɛ́lam; mbɔk báfú Mɛsopotemia, báchák atú Judéya, abhɛ́nɛ́fú atú Kapadóshiya; mbɔk báfú atú Pɔ́ntɔs, báchák atú Ésia.

Sɛ́nɨ̀kmʉɛt bɛ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnɔ nɛ́nkwák mǎmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́kwáy ntá nkoŋo Yesu Acha. Ɛnɔ nɛ́kʉ̀ Mandɛm ambɔŋ maŋák, nɛ nɛ́kwàk mǎnkʉ nɔkɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛrɨ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mbi, nɛ nɛ́kʉ̀ mǎndɨŋɨ Mandɛm mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ.

Mɔ́wa Tímɔti, mɛ̌ghati wɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ. Bɛ́kɔ̀ ndɔ́ŋ ámɔt nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bo antɨ nɛ bárɛm ɛ̌ti yɛ. Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn-nɛ mɛ̌ghàti wɔ bɛ́bhɔŋ bɛ́bhák ntá yɛ mbɔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ nɛnu ndu bɛkʉ ɔ́nu sayri nɛ bo abhɛn bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́pú tɛtɛp.
Ángɛl ánáŋá nɔ́kɔ́ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m, ngók ɛwat mbɔ ɛnɛ ngɛmtay-bǒ amfay ndǔ bábɨ̀k bɛ, “Haleluya! Yí kɛ ápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ. Kɛnókó nɛ bɛtaŋ bɛchi amɔ́ Mandɛm.
Ndǔ mpok anɛ afʉɛ́rɛ́ ansɛm, bǎchi nyaka mbɔ bawú bɛsí Mandɛm mbɔnyunɛ bǎpú bhʉɛrɛ nyaka bɛbhé Mandɛm ɛ̌ti bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka.
Bǎpú kwáy bɛsɔt nkɔ́p Acha mǎnjibhiri mmʉɛt mǎnyú nɔkɔ mmɛ́m bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ. Nɛ bǎbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ mɛ́nyiɛ́ nɛnyíɛ́ Acha, mǎnjibhiri mmʉɛt mányìɛ̀ nɔkɔ nɛnyíɛ́ bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ.
Bǎchi bo Mandɛm. Bǎkɛ́ bhɔŋ yɛ̌nyɨŋ bɛkʉ nɛ ɛpúsí, nɛ bɛbɛ́ptí nkaysi. Bǎkɛ́ fyɛ́ amɨ́k ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ bo bachak. Bǎkɛ rɔ mbɔŋ bɛ mántáká mɛnyɨ̌ŋ ɛbhɔ ndu nkwɔ ywɛka.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɨ ntá mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́chi pɛ́pɛ́p, kɛ ntá mmu anɛ ntɨ ɛni nɛ́pú pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ abhɨkɨ noko Yesu, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́rɨrɨ ɛpu. Bɛ́rɛm tɛtɛp, nkaysi yap nɛ batɨ̌ yap ánáŋ áchɔ́ŋɔ amɛm.

Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bághókó yi, bábhák maknkay, mámbɛbhɛ nɔkɔ batɨ bɛ, “Pú nkúbhɛ́ mmǔ-nɛ kɛ ákɔ̀ nyaka angʉɛbhɛ nɔkɔ nɛnu nɛ bo abhɛn bábhɨ̀ŋɨ nnyɛ́n Yesu awu Yerúsalɛm nɛ? Atwɔ fá chí bɛ́ ánkɛ́mtí bo Yesu angwɔt, ansɔt ampɛtnsɛm nɛ bhɔ Yerúsalɛm. Atwɔ fá ndu bɛkɛmti bhɔ bɛ ansɔt ampɛtnsɛm nɛ bhɔ́ ntá bǒ batí bachiǎkap Mandɛm.”
Kɛ nɛ́nɛ, bɛtɨk ɛbhɛn Kristo bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn bachiǎkap abhɛn Nku Nsɨ́, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ nku anɛ ákʉ́ Yesu ate nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ bho áchá anɛ nsɨ́, mbɔnyunɛ akɔ nɛ nku anɛ árɨ́ áchá.
Ntá ya, bɛbhak nɛpɛ́m chí bɛ́chyɛ Kristo kɛnókó, kɛ bɛ́gu arɨ mbɔŋ achá.
Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ chɔŋ Mandɛm mmu ábhó ɛrɨ́tí bɛtɨk amɛm batɨ yɛka andɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ bhɔ kpátɛ mpok anɛ yi ánaŋa bhɔ ndu nywɔp ɛnɛn Yesu Kristo ápɛtnsɛm.

Sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ́ Mmɔ Mandɛm atwɔ anɛ́nɛ́ batɨ ayɛsɛ amɛm bɛ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Mandɛm mmu achi tɛtɛp. Nɛ́nɛ, sɛbharɛ mmʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Mɔ́ywi Yesu Kristo. Yí aywǐntí kɛ̌ áchí Mandɛm tɛtɛp nɛ yí kɛ̌ áchyɛ̀ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ywɛka abhɔŋ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ákway bɛkʉ bɛ ambak kpák nɛ bo mankɛm mpoknkɛm.

Sɛ́nkɛ́m sayri nɛbhakántɨ ɛnɛn sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ambɨ ɛbhɛn sɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ sɛbhaka ntɨ arɛ́. Sɛ́kɛ́ makati mbɔnyunɛ Mandɛm mmu afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ ǎbhʉrɛ bariɛp ami.
Nchí rɔ kpák ámbák nɛ bhe. Nchí chyɛ bhe kpák anɛ áfù ntá ya. Puyɛ̌ ɛnyǔ mmɨk áchyɛ̀ bho kpák kɛ̌ mɛ̌chyɛ. Bǎkɛ rɔ batɨ ánsɔ́ŋɔ́rí bhe amɛm, nɛ bǎkɛ rɔ bɛcháy mɛ́mbak amɛm batɨ yɛka.
Sɛ́bhɔŋ yɛ ntɨ nɛtaŋ nɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm ndu sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ, ɛnɛ́ sɛ́bhʉɛ́t ndǔ mmʉɛt ɛnɛ, sɛ́pú kway bɛbhak amfay nɛ Yesu Acha.
Mmu anɛ ághókó ɛyɔŋ ɛya kɛ yi kɛkʉ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yí ághókó, mpú táŋ yí. Mbɨ́kɨ́ twɔ fá amɨk bɛ́táŋ bo, ntwɔ chi bɛpɛmɛ bho.
Sɛ́kɛ́ bhak mbɔ Ken mmu achi nyaka mmɔ̌ Satan, mbʉ́mbʉ, ɛ́kʉ awáy mɔ́mayi Ábɛl. Awáy manɔ ndaká yí? Awáy manɔ mbɔnyunɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi akʉ bɛbɛp nyaka, kɛ ɛbhɛn manɔ bɛbhak chak bɛsí Mandɛm.
Bɛtɔk ɛbhɛn bɛchi nɛntɨ nnyɛ́n mɛ́nɛ́msi. Njiɛ ɛnkɛm nkwɔ ɛnɛmsi.

Mpok yɔ, Ábraham anáŋ akɔk nyaka tontó, ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yi apu pɛrɛ kway bɛbhɔŋ bɔ. Yɛ̌ nɔ, bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi báyá kpát mbɔ mambě mfay nɛ mbɔ ɛ̌siɛ́p ɛnɛ ɛchi angɔkɔnyɛ́n ɛnyu ɛnɛ yɛ̌ mmu apu kway bɛpay bhɔ.
Bakak nɛ kɛnókó ámbák nɛ Mandɛm anɛ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ ngwɛ́nti. Achi Mfɔ anɛ ápú gú nɛ bápú ghɔ́ yi nɛ amɨ́k nɛ ndiɛrɛ yí kɛ achí Mandɛm. Amen.

Ángɛl arɛm nɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛtaŋataŋ bɛ, “Cháy ká Mandɛm mǎndɛm bɛ mɛnwɔp ɛbhi bɛya bɛcha mbɔnyunɛ mpok anɛ yi átàŋ bo agháká. Chiɛ́ ká yi kɛnókó! Yi kɛ ághókó mfay nɛ mmɨk, nɛ bɔmanyu, nɛ babhok anɛ́ manyiɛp ányày arɛ.”

Mpok yɔ, bakoŋo Yesu báre yá mándɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ. Bɛ́táŋá bɛ́kwɛ́n. Bo Israɛl abhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛyɔŋ Grik nkwɔ báré nywinti bɛ abhɛn bárɛ̀m chi ndiɛrɛ ɛyɔŋ bo Israɛl bákɔ̀rɛ mɛnyɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛwak kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndu bɛchyɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́ bhap.
Chi ndu ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ɛkɛ́bhɛ́ntɨ kɛ Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ Yesu Kristo nkwɔ abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka ɛsɔŋɔri ɛ̌ti yɛka, arɔ be ɛrɨŋ bɛ mǎnkóŋó nɔ́kɔ́ bayat yi.
Yɛ̌ chi mpok sɛchi nɛ bhe sɛ́ghàti nyaka be bɛ mbák mmu apú kʉ bɛtɨk bǎkɛ́ chyɛ yi nɛnyíɛ́.
“Mandɛm akɔŋ nyaka bǒ mmɨk tontó, kpát achyɛ Njaŋá Mɔ́ywi bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ánókó yi, ákɛ́ gu ánɛ́m, kɛ ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛ́nti.
Ɛwak ɛ́mɔ́t ɛfóŋó ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛghati bhɔ bɛ, “Ndɨ́ŋɨ́ Yesu, ndɨŋɨ Pɔ̌l, kɛ báchí ntɨkɨ bho?”
Ngɔ́ yɛ́ nnya mbʉ́mbʉ nɛ bafɔ̌ mmɨk nɛ bakwɔ́ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhap ndu báchɛ̀m nɛbhʉɛt amɔt bɛ manu nɛ mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ mpɔŋɔndɨ́k nɛ batɛmɛ́ nɛnu bhi.
Sɛ́rɔ́k sɛ́chwé áchwí anɛ áfú Adramatium. Abhɔ́ŋ nyaka bɛ́tɛ́mɛ ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nɛchyɛ̌nyɛ́n atú Esia. Sɛ́fá sɛ́ré rɔ́ŋ. Arístakɔs mmu Masidónia wu áfú Tɛsalónika abhak nɛ bhɛsɛ́.
Kaysí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo abhɛn báchí ɛkɛrɛ́kɛnɔŋ mbɔ bɛ bǎchi arɛ nɛ bhɔ. Kaysí nɔ́kɔ́ ka bo abhɛn batɨ̌ bakwǎŋwaŋ báchyɛ bhɔ ɛsɔŋɔri, tɛ̌ndu be nkwɔ bǎkwáy bɛbhɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri bɔ bhɔ.
Nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎkʉ̀, nɛ ɛnɛ́ bǎrɛ̀m, mǎnkʉ yɔ ndu nnyɛ́n Yesu Acha, mǎmfʉɛt ntá yi mǎnchyɛ nɔkɔ bakak ntá Ɛta Mandɛm.
Mmu anɛ bátɔ̀ŋ yi Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ mmu anɛ átɔ̀ŋ yi aywi ákɔ́rɛ́ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.
Ábraham abhak fá, yɛ̌ nɔ, Mandɛm kɛchyɛ yí yɛ̌ chí mɔ́nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́ mmɨk. Afyɛ́ chí bariɛp bɛ́chyɛ mmɨk ntá yi nɛ ntá bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi yɛ̌ndu yi abhɨkɨ bhɔŋ nyaka mmɔ́.
Mfɔ wú achyɛ bǒ bhɛsɛ bɛyǎ ɛsɔŋɔri, akʉ bɔtayɛsɛ mándɔ́ bɔ̌bhap nɛfí mángú.
Píta afú yɛ nɛ nkoŋo anɛfú wu, báfá, báré rɔ́ŋ ndǔ nnɛm.
Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ nchí kʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ́ ntɨ ɛna nɛ́mbák pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ Mandɛm, nɛ́mbak pɛ́pɛ́p nɛ bo.

Bɔ báchi mbɔ bɛtaŋtí mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn amɛm manyu ngo ɛnɛ́ ɛ́gbògho ɛ́mbay nɔkɔ gboo, gboo. Mɛnyɨŋ ntianywɔp ɛbhɛn bɔ bákʉ̀ bɛchi mbɔ ɛfɛn ɛnɛ́ mpɛ́rɛ́nyɛn ɛ́gbogho ɛmbay nɔkɔ angɔkɔnyɛ́n. Báchí mbɔ mambě mfay anɛ ábóŋoboŋ. Mandɛm abhʉ́rɛ́ ɛbhak ntá yap, ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ ɛ́giri pyɔɔ. Arɛ́ kɛ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́bhak ngwɛnti ti.
abhɨ́kɨ́ fu ntá nkwǎ, nɛ yɛ̌ nkwǎŋwaŋ abhɨkɨ tɔŋ mɛ. Mbɔŋ Yesu Kristo kɛ ákʉ́ mɛndɨ́ŋɨ́ yɔ.
Mpok anɛ sɛ́kòŋo nyaka mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyàŋ sɛnkʉ, ɛbhé ɛ́kú sɛ́ré ŋwaka bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ mɛntwɔ bhɛsɛ nɛ nɛwú.

Ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Yesu ákʉ́ kɛ Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ mɛ bɛ mbak mǔnto, bɛ́ ngátí nɔ́kɔ́ bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo nɛ bɛ ntɔŋ nɔkɔ bǒ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm bɛ́ mánókó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi tɛtɛp. Nchí rɛm chi tɛtɛp, mpú sénse.

Bǒ mankɛm abhɛn bábhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Mandɛm chí bǒ abhɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ yi, yí abhɔ́ŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ bhɔ. Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ bhɛsɛ bɛ Mandɛm achi nɛ bhɛsɛ chí Ɛfóŋó yi mmu yi achyɛ bhɛsɛ.
Yɛ̌ mmǔ ywɛka ákɛ́ kʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwák yí aywǐntí. Mmu ywɛká apɛrɛ́ kʉ́ ɛnyɨŋ, ánkʉ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kwàk bo báchák nkwɔ́.
Bák ká ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt nɛ batɨ. Bǎkɛ́ yoŋ mmʉɛt, fyɛ́ ka mmʉɛt nɛ yɛ̌ chí bo abhɛn bápú yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Bǎkɛ́ kaysi bɛ bǎrɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ.
Dɔ̌ ká nkaysi bɛyǎ mpap, nɛ bɛběntɨ, nɛ ɛchoko-ntɨ, nɛ bɛ́táŋá, nɛ bɛchɔŋti manyɛ́n batɨ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi bɛkʉ batɨ bɛbʉ́.
Ɛ̌ti bǒnkwɔ kɛ Mandɛm ákʉ́ bɛ mbak mǔbɛtok ndu bɛkʉ mǎndɨŋɨ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm sayri.
Ɛmɛnɛ́nti yi ɛbhak pɛ́pɛ̌pɛ́p mbɔ ɛtɔkɔfiɔŋ. Ntí ywi ábhák ɛnyumɔt. Amɨ́k ayi ábhák mbɔ ngó anɛ ádù.

Bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi ndǔ bɛrɨ ɛbhɛka, bɛ ndǔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm bɛ́gháká ntá bɛyǎ bho, mɛ́nkʉ́ bo abhɛn báchyɛ̀ Mandɛm bakak mánjá mándɔk nɔkɔ chi ambɨ, bɛ bo mánchyɛ nɔ́kɔ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó.
Mmu anɛ ányìɛ nyamwʉɛ́t ya nɛ anyú manoŋ ma, achí babhát nɛ mɛ, nɛ mɛ nkwɔ́ nchí babhat nɛ yi.
Matá akɛmɛ bɛ, “Acha, nnókó. Nnókó bɛ́ ɔchí Mpɛmɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ nyaka bariɛp bɛ ǎtò, Mmɔ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛ́twɔ fá amɨk.”
Bachyɛ mmʉɛt ndu bɛ́ghɔ́k mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bǒnto Yesu bátɔ̀ŋ. Bɔ́ mankɛm abhɛn manókó babhak ndu nsoŋ amɔt ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, ndǔ Nɛnyiɛ Acha nɛ ndu nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt.
Ɔkɔŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛchí chak nɛ ɔpap ɛpɨŋ ɛnɛ bo bapu bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé. Mɛ Mandɛm ywɛ nkʉ yɛ wɔ ɔ́mbɔ́ŋ maŋák mbɔnyunɛ nchyɛ́ wɔ kɛnókó ɛkɛ́n kɛ́chá ɛkɛn mamʉɛrɛ bhɛ mankɛm.”
Achyɛ ɛyɔŋ bákɛ́m Jems manɔ Jɔ̌n báwáy nɛ akparɛnja.
Kɛ́ chwe ndǔ kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkɛ́n kɛ́pú chyɛ Mandɛm kɛnókó. Ɛ́nyu kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ɛkɔ kɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánsap nɛkɔ nɛ Mandɛm.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ápàp ntɨ achí ngwayti bho. Nɛ bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti nɛ́pú bhak nɛ ngwayti bho.
Mányiɛ nɔ́kɔ́ nɛnyíɛ́, Yesu arɛm ntá Símun Píta bɛ, “Símun, mmɔ̌ Jɔ̌n, ɔkɔŋ mɛ ɔchá mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn-ɛ?” Símun akɛmɛ bɛ, “Ɛɛ, Acha, ɔrɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ nkɔŋ wɔ.” Yesu arɛm bɛ, “Ne bɔ̌bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n ayá.”
Ntá mmu amɔt, Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ǎchyɛ akap bɛchyɛ maníɛ́. Ntá mmu achak Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ anchyɛ akap bɛrɛm mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ́ yi andɨ́ŋɨ́.
Nɛrɔ́ŋ anɛ bɔ́ bárɔŋɔ arɛ́ ndɔŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛjwi ɛ́páy, Josɛ́f akʉ bɔ̌mayi bárɨŋɨ yí, nɛ Mfɔ Íjip arɨŋɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt Josɛ́f.
Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu anɛ áyàŋ bɛbhɔŋ ɛrɨ́tí nɛpɛ́m, nɛ áyàŋ bɛbhak maŋák, ánkɛ́m nɛ́rɨ ɛni bɛ ákɛ́ rɛm ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ, bɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛbʉ́bʉ ɛ́kɛ́ fu yi anyu.
Nkwɔ́ bo abhɛn mánókó Yesu bábhɔ́ŋ ntɨ nɛ́mɔt nɛ nkaysi amɔt. Yɛ̌ mmu wap akɛ rɛm bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhi bɛ́chí chí ndiɛrɛ ntá yi aywǐntí. Ɛnyɨŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ɛbhak ɛnyɨŋ ɛyap mankɛm.
Nnɛ́m ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌ghàti bhe mbɔ ɛnyǔ bághátí nyaka mɛ nkwɔ chi bɛ: Kristo agú nyaka ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ bhɛsɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ́mɛ́ nyaka bɛ chɔŋ ɛ́mfakari.
Mandɛm atɛ́msí bo ɛtɔk Bábilɔn mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ kɛ báwáy barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ nɛ bo Mandɛm bachak mankɛm. Manoŋ bǒ mmɨk mankɛm abhɛn bɔ baway achí bɔ anti.”

Bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl bághókó nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ, bábhɔŋ bɛyǎ maŋák, bábhó bɛ́chyɛ bakak ntá Mandɛm ɛ̌ti ɛyɔŋ ɛyi. Nɛ abhɛn Mandɛm áyábhɛ́ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛ́n nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔ́ŋ ngwɛnti, mánoko Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ ɛ̌ti Yesu.
Yesu mmu ákʉ́ bo mandɨŋɨ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn árɛ̀m bɛ, “Nchí twɔ́ mandú mpok!” Amen. Yesu Acha, twɔ́!

Bǎkɛ́ rɔ bɛkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎghɔ́kɔ́ ntá ya, nɛ ndu bɛ́kóŋo yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nkaysi anɛ áfú ndǔ Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm ɛnɛ́ bǎsɔrɛ ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ bǎghókó ntá ya, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ bǎghɔ́ mɛ́ nkʉ. Nɛ chɔŋ kpák anɛ Mandɛm áchyɛ̀ ambak nɛ bhe.
Kɛ bǎkɛ́ sɔt ɛnyu mmu wu mbɔ mǔmpap. Kɛ ya ká yí batú nɛ ɛkɔŋ mbɔ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ.

Sɔt ka mpok bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ sɔt nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɛn bǒ mmɨk nɛ sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu andwɔ be mǎmbák basɛm ntá mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bátɔ̀ŋ be. Ɛnyǔ nɛrɨŋɨ́ndak ɛnɔ nɛ́fù chi ndǔ nkaysi bakwǎŋwaŋ nɛ ntá bɛfóŋó ɛbhɛn bɛbhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ fá amɨk, nɛ́pú fu ntá Kristo.
Mpú rɔ bɛ́fyɛ́ bɛtaŋ bɛ́ njɛt téé tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti, mbɔ́ŋ nsáy. Nsáy yɔ achí bɛ Mandɛm abhɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛ ntwɔ bɛ mbak amfay nɛ yi ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo mmu ágú ɛ̌ti ya.
Yesu achyɛ́ nɛpɛ́m ɛni bɛ́fɛ́rɛ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋá bɛbʉ́ mɛnkɛm nɛ ndu bɛso batɨ ywɛsɛ. Akʉ nɔ, bɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi yímbɔŋ, nɔ chi bo abhɛn bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛkʉ chi bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ.
Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mmǔ anɛ ághókó ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mɛ̌rɛ̀m, anoko mmu anɛ átó mɛ, ǎbhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Mandɛm apú rɛm bɛ bɛkwɛ́nɛ́ bɛchi nɛ yi. Afǔ ndǔ nɛwú, achwe ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
Ángɛl anɛ árɛ̀m nɛ mɛ akɛ́m ɛnɔk bɛyɛnti mɛnyɨŋ awɔ. Ɛnɔk ɛyɔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ pú. Ayɛnti ɛtɔk nɛ ɛnɔk ɛyɔ. Ayɛnti nkwɔ manyǔbha nɛ nkók.

Ngwɛnti yap chi mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́. Mandɛm awap chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́fʉɛ̀t bɔ anyu ɛ́nchwe bɔ mɛniɛ nɛ mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ɛbhɛn bɔ báfyɛ̀ ngoŋo arɛ́. Bákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bághɔ̀ mámbɔ́ŋ chí ntíánwɔ́p, yɛ̌ nɔ, bɔ́ babhɔŋ bápànyu ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ. Nɛ bábhʉrɛ batɨ yap ndǔ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk.
Mǔnti abhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ bɛbhak mɔ̌nkɔ ndǔ Nkwɔ Yesu mbɔnyunɛ ǎkway bɛyoŋ mmʉɛt nɛ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ Mandɛm antɛmsi yi mbɔ ɛnyu átɛ́msí nyaka Satan.

Abhɛn ɛkɔŋ, ndu nchí yáŋ tontó bɛsɨŋ be ɛ̌ti nɛpɛmɛ anɛ Mandɛm ápɛ́mɛ́ bhɛsɛ mankɛm, ngɔ́ bɛ mbɔŋ bɛsɨŋ ngáti bhe bɛ mǎnkɛ́m tɛtɛp anɛ Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ bɛ ambak mbɔ ɛnyǔ báchyɛ́ yɔ ntá bo Mandɛm ndɔŋ amɔt ndak ámáy.
Batɨ ábé bhɔ mbɔnyunɛ Píta nɛ Jɔ̌n bátɔ̀ŋ mángati nɔkɔ bo bɛ́ Yesu apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m bɛtɔŋ bɛ chɔŋ bawú mámpɛtsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m.
Fú ká mbɔnyunɛ bɛbʉ́ bhap bɛghaka tɛ amfay, nɛ Mandɛm ábhɨ́kɨ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bhɔ́.
Yesu apɛt arɔk ɛtɔk Kána, atú Gálili, ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt anɛ yi ákú nyaka manyiɛp áyíbhírí mmɛ́m. Mǔnti amɔt abhak Kapɛ̌naum anɛ mɔ́ywi áme.
Fíɛ́ ká bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk, bǎkɛ́ bhak babhɔt. Kʉ ka bɛtɨk Yesu Acha nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm.
Bǎkɔŋ yi yɛ̌ndu bǎbhɨkɨ re ghɔ yi. Mǎnoko yi yɛ̌ndu bápú ghɔ́ yi nɛ́nɛ, nɛ bábhɔ̀ŋ maŋák amɛn ábhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ njɛnti nɛ amɛn mmu apú kwáy bɛrɛm ɛnyu mɔ achi.
Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́kʉ̀ sɛ́ndɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ sɛ́chi nɛ Mandɛm mpoknkɛm nɛ bɛ yí achí nɛ bhɛsɛ mpoknkɛm chí Ɛfóŋó yi ɛnɛ yi achyɛ bhɛsɛ.
Ɛjɔ̌ mmɛ́m amɛn ánɛn ɛchí nyaka arɛ téé. Básɔ́t ɛkuchá fofok bágwɔ́t antí ntábhɛ́nɔk ɛnɛ bábhɨŋɨ bɛ haysɔp, bátáp ndǔ mmɛm mɔ básá yi anyu.
Afɛ́rɛ́ bhɛsɛ ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn ɛjuri, akʉ bɛ Mɔ́ywi mmu yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́ tontó ámbák wu Mfɔ ywɛsɛ.

Bɔ̌ma, nchí nɨk be mmʉɛt bɛ mǎnsɔt mpok nɛ bo abhɛn bátwɔ̀ nɛ ákɔ́rɛ́ nɛntɨ ɛnɛka nɛ bákʉ̀ bo mántɨ́knsɛm ntá Mandɛm ndǔ bátɔ̀ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi kɛkúrí nɛ ɛbhɛn bǎghɔ́kɔ́. Bák ká nɛkɔ nɛsiɛ nɛ bhɔ́.
Mbák Mandɛm achyɛ́ mmu akap bɛkwak bho, ánkwák bho. Mbák chí akap bɛtɔŋ bho, ántɔ́ŋ bho.
Ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɔ, bapú pɛrɛ bhɛ́p mɛ yɛ̌nyɨŋ. Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, mbák mǎmbɛp Ɛtaya yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ndǔ nnyɛ́n ɛna, ǎchyɛ bhe.

Básɔ́t mɛnyǔ batay ŋáŋaŋ byo nɛ apay bághóko nɛbhʉɛ́rɛ́mɨk bɛ andɨ amɨ́k. Ɛnyǔ ntay nɛmɔt nɛ́bhák Jáspa, ɛnɛn nɛjwi apay nɛ́bhák sáfaya, ɛnɛn nɛjwi arat nɛ́bhák agate, nɛ ɛnɛn nɛjwi anwi nɛ́bhák ɛ́meral.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɨŋɨ ɛrɨ́tí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ yí ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ, kɛ yí kɛkʉ yɔ́, bɛsí Mandɛm, akʉ bɛbʉ́.
Ngók yɛ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bě bɔ̌bɛtok Mandɛm mankɛm nɛ be bho báchyɛ̀ yí kɛnókó, manɛ́m bho nɛ ndɛ́ndɛmɛ bho, bɨtí ká Mandɛm aywɛsɛ.”
Tɛtɛp, sɛ́chi ndǔ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ fá amɨk nɛ sɛ́nòŋ nɛ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ Mandɛm anchyɛ bhɛsɛ mmʉɛt ɛkɔ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay,
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ánjɨ́ŋɨ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ákʉ̀, nɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ sayri áŋák nɛ mmʉɛt ɛyi, kɛbhak bɛ ǎyɛ̀nti mmʉɛt nɛ mmǔ achak.
Bɛ́yɨ́ŋɨ mmǔ anɛ átɨ́ bɛbhay ngɔrɛ́, mbák aghɔ bɛ abhɔŋ bɛbhay ngɔrɛ́ ndǔ bɛyǎ ɛkwak bɛ́chí yi antɨ nɛ apu kway bɛkɛm mmʉɛt, nɛ mpok ǎfʉɛ̀t, ɛ́rɨ bɛ́ ámbáy ngɔrɛ́. Bɛbʉ́ bɛpu arɛ.
Chɔŋ mámbok bhé ndǔ bɛkɛrɛ́ nɛnɨkɨ́mʉɛt ɛbhap. Mpok ǎtwɔ̀ anɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ áwày bhe, akaysi bɛ́ ǎkʉ̀ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ.
Ngɔ́ ɛrɛm ɛrɨŋ nɛ ɛrɨŋɨ́ maknkay ɛchak amfay. Ngɔ́ bɔángɛl tándrámɔt, nɛ bɛghori tándrámɔt ɛbhɛn bɛchi bɛghori ɛbhɛn ngwɛnti mbɔnyunɛ bɔ kɛ bɛtɔŋ bɛběntɨ Mandɛm ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ ndǔ ngwɛnti.
Yesu akɛmɛ yi bɛ, “Mbák ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́pú chak, ghatí mɛ yɔ. Kɛ mbák ndɛm ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi chak, ɔdɛp mɛ ndáká yí?”

Nɛ wɔ ɛrɨ́tí ntɨ nkʉbɛtɨk wa, nchí yáŋ nkwɔ́ bɛ ɔ́nkwák mɛ́nyúrɛ́ bághɔrɛ́ abhɛn bati apay bɛ́ mámbák ɛyɔŋ ɛ́mɔt. Bákʉ́ bɛyǎ bɛtɨk nɛ mɛ ndu mɛ́nu bɛ́gháti bho Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́. Bákʉ́ bɛtɨk nɛ Klɛ́mɛn, nɛ batɨ̌ bakʉ̌ bɛtɨk abha báchák. Bɔ́ mankɛm báchí bo Mandɛm ásɨ́ŋɨ́ manyɛ́n ayap amɛm ɛkáti manyɛ́n bǒ abhɛn bábhɔ̀ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti.
Bo bákʉ manoŋ bo Mandɛm nɛ amɛn barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ Mandɛm arɔŋ amɨk. Ɛ̌ti yɔ kɛ ɔ́chyɛ́ bhɔ́ manoŋ mányu. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kway nɛ bhɔ”.
Wáwák! Bɛsɛ bho sɛrɔbhɛ chi mbɔ bawú ndǔ nté yɛsɛ nɛ bɛbʉ́, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́?
Mbák chí nnya anɛ achi nyaka nɛpɛ́m kɛ apɛt apú, yɔ́ achi mfɔ anɛ ajwí mánɛn. Achí nyaka amɔt ndǔ abhɛn tándrámɔt. Chɔŋ mángwáy yɔ ndak amay.
Kɛ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ yi? Ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bók ngɔrɛ́ anɛ achi nsɛm nɛ mɔ́ywi, mbɔnyunɛ mmɔ̌ nsɛm ápú kwáy mɛnyiɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛ́táyi nɛ mmɔ̌ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ ápú nsɛm.”
Bo abhɛn báyàŋ bɛbhɔŋ bɛyǎ nkáp báwakari bɛkwɛn ndǔ nɛmɔ, mánkwɛn ndu ntá nɛ nkaysi anɛ átwɔ̀ bhɔ́ nɛ mɛ́nɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛwú.
Chɔŋ nnya mbʉmbʉ nɛ babhaŋ ayi byo anɛ ate ndǔ bafɔ byo mámpap ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ. Chɔŋ mánsɔt yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́, mankʉ yi andɔp ɛbho ɛwɔ. Chɔŋ mányiɛ nyamwʉɛ́t ɛyi nɛ mánsɔŋ yi nɛ ngó.
Kɛ mmǔ anɛ akɔŋ Mandɛm kɛ Mandɛm árɨŋɨ mbɔ aywǐ mmu.
Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm yɛ bɛ yi? Bɛ́ nté ayɛsɛ bo Israɛl acha anɛ bo bachak kɛ? Wáwák! Nnáŋ ntɔŋ bɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛbhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay bo mankɛm, yɛ̌ chi bo Israɛl nɛ yɛ̌ chi abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl.
Bághóko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi mbɔ mɔ́mpɔŋ, bare chyɛ yɔ akabhɛ́ nya, nɛ mányíɛ́ ɛpa ɛ̌ti ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ baghoko nɛ amɔ.

Bakwǎŋwaŋ abhɛn bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɔ bɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ way, kɛtɨ́knsɛm ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɔ bághókó nɛ amɔ. Bɔ́ kɛrɔ bɛchyɛ kɛnókó ntá bɛfóŋó bɛbʉ́bɛbʉ, nɛ ntá bɔmandɛm nsé abhɛn bɔ babhɔŋ bághókó nɛ pú, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ silbha, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ brɔ́ns, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ batay, nɛ abhɛn bághókó nɛ mɛnɔk, nɛ bɔmandɛm nsé bhɔ bápú ghɔ mbaŋ, bápú ghok mbaŋ, nɛ bapu kɔ!

Ndu sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ ǎtàŋ chɔŋ bo mankɛm, sɛbhɔŋ bɛcháy nɛ Yesu Acha. Bɛchay ɛbhɛn bɛ́kʉ sɛ́fyɛ̀ yɛ bɛtaŋ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ bo mánóko bɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghàti bhɔ bɛchi tɛtɛp. Mbɔŋ Mandɛm arɨ́ŋɨ́ bhɛsɛ́ sayri, nɛ nkáysí bɛ be nkwɔ bǎrɨŋɨ ɛnyǔ bo sɛ́chi.

Bɛsɛ mankɛm nkwɔ sɛ́kʉ̀ nyaka mbɔ bhɔ, sɛ́nkoŋo nɔkɔ chi bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmʉɛt ɛyɛsɛ nɛ batɨ̌ yɛsɛ áŋwàka bɛ sɛnkʉ. Ndǔ ntee ayɛsɛ yɔ, Mandɛm abhɔ̌ŋ nyaka bɛchyɛ bhɛsɛ ntɛ́msí mbɔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu achak ndu ábé nyaka ntɨ tontó ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́.
Píta arɔk ambɨ bɛ́rɛm baya mɛnyɨŋ bɛ́chák ansɛmti nɔkɔ bhɔ bɛ́ “Fɛrɛ́ ká mmʉɛt ndǔ ntɛmsi anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́twɔ ntá bǒ bɛbʉ́ abhɛn fá ammɨk.”
Mbák mmu ywɛka ánkóŋó mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bakwǎŋwaŋ báyàŋ bɛkʉ, ǎgú. Kɛ mbák mǎnkoŋo mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn Ɛfóŋó áyàŋ mǎnkʉ chɔŋ mǎmbɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.
Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyu Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Apú rɔ yɛ̌ mmu anɛ ánókó yi ambɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p.”
Ɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ chi bɛ nchí kaka Mandɛm. Chi Yesu Kristo kɛ ákʉ̀ bɛ ɛmbak nɔ mbɔnyunɛ mmɨk nkɛm aghok ɛ̌ti ɛnyǔ nɛka ɛnɛn bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ Yesu.
Bɔ̌ma, sɛ́rɨ́ŋɨ́ bɛ́ Mandɛm akɔŋ be nɛ ayap be
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛcha bɛchak mɛnkɛm chi bɛ mǎndɔk ambɨ bɛkɔŋ batɨ nɛ batɨ ayɛka ankɛm tɛ̌ndu ɛkɔŋ ɛ́kùti bɛyǎ bɛbʉ́.
Barɛm bɛ sɛnsɔt áchwí sɛndɔk Itali. Básɔt yɛ Pɔ̌l nɛ mbɔk bǒkɛnɔŋ báchyɛ́ ntá Juliɔs mǔnti ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu ɛnɛ babhɨŋɨ bɛ ɛká batɛmɛ́ nɛnu Mfɔ Rom.

Bátée angɔkɔ manyu wu mánkway nɔkɔ nɛkwáy Moses mmɔ̌bɛtok Mandɛm nɛ ɛnɛn Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n bɛ, “Acha, Mandɛm Bɛtaŋ Mɛnkɛm, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ́ chi manɛm mɛnyɨŋ nɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ maknkay! Wɔ, Mfɔ bɛtɔk mɛnkɛm, mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn ɔ́kʉ̀ bɛ́bhak chi chak. Nɛ ɔchí tɛtɛp.
Bák ká mbɔ mɔ̌nkɔ mmu áŋwaka mɛnyu amɨ mpoknkɛm. Bɔ́ŋ ká ɛkwak nɛbhɨ ɛnɛn mbɔŋ, nɔ chi, Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Yɔ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bɛ mǎngo Mandɛm ápɛmɛ bhe.

Ngók yɛ́ ɛyɔŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́fú amfay ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Sɨ́ŋ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn amɨk: Bɛbho ɛchɔŋ, ɛrɨ ɛcha ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ágú ɛnɛ́ yi ábhárɛ́ mmʉɛt nɛ Yesu Acha nɛ ntɨ nɛmɔt.” Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ árɛ̀m bɛ, “Ɛchi tɛtɛp, chɔŋ yi ambɔŋ nɛywɛ̌mʉɛt ndǔ bɛtɨk ɛbhi mbɔnyunɛ nsáy bɛtɨk ɛbhi ǎkoŋo yi.”

Mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mmu Mandɛm ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛkʉ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɨ́ bɛsí Mandɛm chí bɛ́ yí ánkwák bɔ̌bɛrǎ nɛ mánkwɛ́sɛ́, nɛ ankɛ́m mmʉɛt bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mmɨk bɛ́kɛ́ chɔŋti yi mɛ́nkʉ́ yi ánjíbhírí ámbák mmǔ bɛbʉ́. Mmǔ Mandɛm anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛnyǔ ɛpɨŋ ɛyɔ kɛ ábhak pɛ́pɛ́p bɛsí Mandɛm.
Nchí ghati bhe mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ sɔt sɛ́rwɔrɛ́nyu ándwɔ bhe ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Kristo, bɛ mǎnɛm ɛbhɨ.

Nɛ ngók ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi amfay, nɛ ɛbhɛn amɨk, nɛ ɛbhɛn ɛtɔkɔ́ bawú, nɛ ɛbhɛn amɛm manyu, bɔ mɛnkɛm bɛre kway bɛ, “Sɛ́mbɨ́tí mmu anɛ achi ndu ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ nɛ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n. Sɛ́nchíɛ bɔ kɛnókó. Kɛfɔ kɛnkɛm kɛchi chi ntá yap. Bɔ kɛ babhɔŋɔ bɛtaŋ mpoknkɛm!”
Ángɛl anɛ́ ajwi bapay afe ayi mmbá. Nɛ básɔt ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi mbɔ njiɛ ngo, ɛnɛ́ ɛ́dù mbɔ ngó, mámɛ́sɛ amɛm manyu. Ɛbhɔ́kɔ́ manyu ɛ́mɔt ndǔ bɛrat ɛ́yíbhíri ɛrɔp chi manoŋ manoŋ.
Báyá yi báfú ɛtɔk nɛ yí, bátɛ́mti yi nɛ bɛtay bawáy. Batísiɛ bɛtábhá báfɛ́rɛ nkú mfǎmʉɛt ɛyap, barɔ ntá ɛsakámu amɔt bɛ ambabhɛri nɔkɔ. Ɛsakámu wu aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Sɔ̌l.
nɛ ndǔ nɛbhʉɛt achak amɛm Ɛkáti Mandɛm yɔ́ ɛ́pɛ́t ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Bě mankɛm abhɛ́n bápú bo Israɛl, bɨ̌tí nɔ́kɔ́ ka Acha. Bo mankɛm, bɨ̌tí nɔ́kɔ́ ká yi.”
Yi kɛ aghoko mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi ndǔ bɛtaŋ ɛbhi, nɛ mɛnyɨŋ mɛnkɛm bɛchi chi ndǔ bɛchyɛ yi kɛnókó. Sɛ́nchíɛ yi kɛnókó mpoknkɛm. Amen.
Ntɨ nywɔp, Jɔ̌n aghɔ Yesu ndu átwɔ̀ ntá yi, arɛm bɛ, “Yɨŋɨ́ Mɔ́nkwɔmɛ́n Mandɛm anɛ ápɔ̀kɔ bɛbʉ́ bo mankɛm fá amɨk!
Nɛka ɛnɛn ngɔrɛ́-nɛkɔ anɛ aka nnyɛ́n bɛ Ráhab kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ nyaka bǒ abhɛn bárɔ́ŋɔ́ ndu bɛghokoti kɛpɨ abhɛsɛ amɛm ɛkɛt ɛyi, yí kɛgú mpok amɔt nɛ bo abhɛn bapú ghok nyaka Mandɛm.
Ngɛ́p ǎtwɔ̀ chí bɛ́ghɛp aghɛ́p, bɛ́wáy, nɛ bɛ́chɔ́ŋti. Ntwɔ bɛ́ bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m nɛ bɛ́ mámbɔ́ŋ nɔ nɛ́njwí pɔɔt nɛ áfɔ́k ankɛm.
Kɛ mbák chí bhɛsɛ, ɛyɛsɛ́ ɛtɔk ɛ́chí amfay, ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ Yesu Kristo Acha achi. Nɛ sɛ́bhaka ntɨ bɛ́ yí mmu áchí Mpɛmɛ ywɛsɛ́ ámfú arɛ́ ámpɛtnsɛm.
Sɔt nɔ́kɔ́ yɛ́ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ntɨ mǔnkwɔ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ Kristo ásɔ́rɛ́ bhe. Ɛyɔ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mánchyɛ́ Mandɛm kɛnókó.

Dɔ́k yɛ nɛ bhɔ amɛm ɛkɛrákap bɛ mǎnsó bɛsí nɛ Mandɛm, bɛtɔŋ bɛ nku yap amay. Wɔmbɔ̌ŋ chyɛ̌ nkáp anɛ bɔ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛchyɛ kɛ mǎmu bati yap. Chɔŋ ɛyɔ ɛ́nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu andɨŋɨ bɛ́ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bárɛ̀m ɛ̌ti yɛ bɛ́pú tɛtɛp, nɛ bɛ́ ɔ̌bhʉ̀rɛ bɛbhé Moses.
Abraham achi nkwɔ chi-mbɨ ntá bǒ abhɛn basyɛp bhɔ mbák bákòŋo bayarɛ́kak yi ndu babhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi áchi nyaka yɛ̌ chi ndu mpok anɛ babhɨkɨ re syɛp yi.
Bágʉɛ́p yɛ ɛbhaŋa ɛ̌ti bǒbhɛn batí apay. Ɛ́ká Matías. Básɔ́t yɛ Matías báchɛm nɛ nkwɔ bǒnto Yesu bachak batí byó nɛ amɔt.”
“Ɛ́rɨ ɛcha ntá bo abhɛn Mandɛm áfóŋórí ɛpɨŋ ɛyap ɛnɛ bápú bhʉɛrɛ bɛbhé, antɛsɛ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhap nkwɔ,
Batísyɛ abhɛn bapay kɛ báchi téé bɛsí Mandɛm mmǔ mmɨk nkɛm achi yi awɔ. Bɔ́ báchi mɛnɔk ólif bɛpay nɛ mɛnɔk ɛbhɛn bɛ́pɔ̀kɔ bɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛpay.

Bǎkɛ́ ghɔkɔntɨk bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka. Bák ká ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́ nɛ nɛdǐ kɛbhɔ, babhɛsɛ ansɛbhɛ nɔkɔ amɨ́k byaká byaká byaká. Dɔ̌ ká nɛway-ámɛ́n ɛnɛká mǎmbák ndǔ basɛ́mɛ́. Dɔ̌ ká maŋák amɛká mǎndɔp ndǔ kɛbhɔ.
Anɛ ɛkɔŋ, ɔ́kɛ́ ŋɔkɔ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛpɨŋ. Ŋɔkɔ́ chí ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́rɨ́. Mmǔ anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛrɨ chi mmu Mandɛm, kɛ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ bɛbʉ́ ábhɨ́kɨ́re ghɔ Mandɛm.

Nsyɛ́p anɛ básiɛ́bhɛ́ Abraham kɛ achi nyaka ɛrɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm afyɛ́ yi amʉɛt bɛtɔŋ bɛ yi abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ yi tɛ mpok anɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́ re syɛp yi. Mandɛm ákʉ́ nyaka nɔ bɛ Ábraham ambak chi-mbɨ ntá bo mankɛm abhɛn mánóko Mandɛm mpok bábhɨ́kɨ́ re syɛp bhɔ, nɛ nta abhɛn nɛka ɛnap nɛ Mandɛm nɛ́kʉ́ yi ásɔ́rɛ́ bɛ bɔ bachi chak bɛsí bhi.
Ɛchi nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bɛbʉ́ bɛpú pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛtaŋ amfay mmu anɛ ánáŋ ágú.
Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhak ɛnɛ sɛ́rɔ̀ŋ, bɛsɔŋɔri ɛbhɛn sɛ́ghɔ̀ bɛchi mbɔ bɛ sɛ́pɔ́kɔ́ nɛwú Yesu amʉɛt sɛ́kɔ̀ nɛ nɔ. Ɛ̌ti yɔ, bo bághɔ̀ nɛpɛ́m Yesu ndu nɛ́kʉ̀ bɛtɨk amʉɛt yɛsɛ.
Nchí rɛm nɔ mbɔnyunɛ bo báchák mankɛm bákàysi chi ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ ɛnap nɛpɛ́m, kɛfyɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛyɨŋɨ Yesu Kristo.

Nɛka ɛnɛn Sará ngɔrɛ́ Ábraham kɛ nɛ́kʉ́ yi ákway nyaka bɛ́pɔ́kɔ mɛniɛ, yɛ̌ndu mamiɛ yi ánáŋ acha nyaka anɛ́ ngɔrɛ́ anɛ akway bɛpɔkɔ mɛniɛ. Ɛ́bhak ɛnyu yɔ mbɔnyunɛ anókó nyaka bɛ Mandɛm achi Mmǔ tɛtɛp, nɛ ǎbhʉ̀rɛ bariɛp ami.
Nɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ mmu anɛ átó mɛ áyàŋ nkʉ chi bɛ nkɛ́rɔ yɛ̌ mmu amɔt anɛ yi áchyɛ́ mɛ ánɛ́m, kɛ bɛ́ nkʉ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu wap ámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.

Kɛ ntá yɛsɛ, sɛ́rɨŋɨ bɛ Mandɛm amɔt kɛ áchí. Yí chí Ɛta nɛ yi kɛ ághókó yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Aghókó bhɛsɛ bɛ sɛ́mbák bǒbhi. Yesu Kristo Acha achí nkwɔ chi amɔt. Mandɛm afʉɛrɛ́ ntá yi kɛ ǎghoko yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ, nɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛsɛ nɛ́fù chi ntá yi.

Kɛ Tímɔti anáŋ áfǔ awu apɛtnsɛm fá, nɛ ɛrɨ́tí ntó bɛ bǎtaŋ ndǔ nɛsɨkɨ́ntɨ ɛnɛka nɛ Kristo nɛ ndǔ ɛkɔŋ ɛnɛ bǎbhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛ batɨ. Nɛ aghátí bhɛsɛ bɛ bǎkàysi bhɛsɛ nɛ maŋák mpoknkɛm nɛ bǎbhɔŋ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhɛsɛ nkúbhɛ́ mbɔ ɛnyǔ sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ ɛkwak bɛghɔ bhe.
Nɛ mpok Mbabhɛri bághɔ́ŋɔmɛ́n anɛ ngo abhesi, chɔŋ anchyɛ bhe akap anɛ́ árɨ́ achá, akap anɛ apu yibhiri ɛnyu.
Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛbhakántɨ́, sɛ́bhɔŋ ngǎngaŋ nɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ nɛ nɛtaŋántɨ.
Kɛ batɔŋɔ́ nse bhɔ bárɛ̀m mɛnyɨŋ mbɔ ɛnyǔ mmʉɛt ɛyap ɛ́tɔ̀ŋ, mbɔ nyǎbhɨ ɛnɛ́ bábhe chi bɛ mankɛm mangway. Bǎbhɔŋ bɛ́way bhɔ mbɔ nyǎbhɨ.

Júdas abhɨkɨ rɛm nyaka ɛnyu ɛyɔ chi bɛ ǎghɔ báchɛ́bɛ́ bho ntínso. Arɛm nɔ chi ndu ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka ntɨ ngɛ́p. Nɛ ndǔ nkwɔ bakoŋo Yesu, yi kɛ áchí nyaka mbʉrɛ nkáp, nɛ ǎsɔ̀t nyaka aywi arɛ́ ansɛm ansɛm anyiɛ nɔkɔ.
Bɛsɛ́ babhɔŋ sɛ́rɨŋɨ yɛ nɛ sɛ́nókó bɛ Mandɛm akɔŋ bhɛsɛ tontó. Mandɛm chi Mmǔ ɛkɔŋ, nɛ mmu anɛ ákɔ̀ŋ batɨ ǎbhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm nɛ Mandɛm ǎbhatmʉɛt nɛ yí.

Bɛyǎ bakoŋo Yesu báfú nyaka Yerúsalɛm ɛ̌ti ɛsɔŋɔri ɛnɛ ɛbho mpok báwáy Stífin bataka mbaŋ nɛ mbaŋ. Mbɔk bárɔk kpatɛ atú Foníshia, báchák tɛ Sáyprɔs nɛ abhɛnɛfu tɛ Ántiɔk. Bárɔŋ nɔkɔ nɔ, mangati nɔkɔ mbok Yesu ntá bo Israɛl bɔ́bhɔ.
Ɛrɛmɛ́ nsáy achí nɛ mmu anɛ ábhʉ̀ɛrɛ nɛpɛ́m ɛni mbɔ ɛnyu Mandɛm áyàŋ nɛ ambɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́.

Nɛ báchyɛ yɔ mbi bɛ ánu nɛ bo Mandɛm ánsɔt awɔ́nɛm. Nɛ báchyɛ yɔ bɛtaŋ amfay yɛ̌ntɨkɨ nnɛrɛ́kɛt bho ankɛm fá amɨk, nɛ amfǎy bo Mandɛm, nɛ amfǎy bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛyɔŋɔ́tɔk nɛ amfǎy bǒ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛtɔk.

Kɛ ntá mmu anɛ ákʉ́ ɛbɛ́ptí ɛnyɨŋ, mbák mándɛ́n wɔ ɔ́nkɛpntɨ, nsáy anɛ ɔ́bhɔ̀ŋ ǎbhák bɛ yi? Kɛ mbák ɔ́kʉ̀ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛchi chak kɛ ɔ́mbɔŋ ɛsɔŋɔri nɛ ɔ́nkɛpntɨ ndǔ ɛsɔŋɔri yɔ, Mandɛm ǎbhɔ́ŋ maŋák nɛ wɔ.

Nɛchyɛ anɛ yi áchyɛ́ mmʉɛt mbɔ akap ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ ákʉ́ yi ate nɛntɨ Mandɛm nɛ nkwǎ ndǔ Nku Nkɔ ndu bɛkʉ bɛ bo abhɛn Mandɛm abhɨŋɨ, mámbɔ́ŋ bɛrɨ́tí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛchyɛ bhɔ, tɛ̌ndu nɛwú nɛ́fɛ́rɛ́ bho ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn Nku Nsɨ́.
Chɔŋ sɛ́ndɛm yɛ bɛ yi? Sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ bɛkʉ bɛbʉ́ bɛ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛnja mɛncha kɛ?
Bǎkɛ́ rɛm yɛ̌ bɛpɔ̌-kɛpɨ nɛ bɛbhokori kɛpɨ, nɛ bǎkɛ́ kʉ bɛchoŋó ntok. Kɛ chyɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ ká bakak ntá Mandɛm.

Ngɔ yɛ mpɔŋɔ́ndɨ́k anɛ achi bɛ̌mm nɛ nnyɛ́n mmǔ anɛ ákɔ̀ yɔ nɛ́bhak bɛ Nɛwú, nɛ Ɛtɔkɔ́ Bawú ɛnkoŋo nɔkɔ yi ansɛm. Báchyɛ Nɛwú nɛ Ɛtɔkɔ́ Bawú bɛtaŋ bɛ mánsɔt nɛnu, nɛ nsay, nɛ ɛghorǐ nɛme, nɛ nnya mběmbe ɛnɛ fá mmɨk mángwáy bo abhɛn bachi ndǔ ɛbhɔ́kɔ́mɨk ɛ́mɔt ndu bɛbhɔkɔ mmɨk mɛnkɛm mɛnwi.

Ɛ̌tiyɔ kɛ ɛchi bɛ bariɛp Mandɛm achi chi ntá bo abhɛn babhɔŋɔ nɛka nɛ yi, bɛtɔŋ bɛ chi ɛ̌ti bɛrɨ̌ndu ɛbhi kɛ yi ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nyaka bɛkʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn yi afyɛ́ bariɛp bɛkʉ ntá yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛbhárɛ́mɔ Ábraham. Bariɛp ami apú chi ndiɛrɛ ntá bo abhɛn bákòŋo bɛbhé, kɛ ntá bo bachak mankɛm nkwɔ abhɛn babhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm mbɔ Ábraham, tɛ̌ndu bɛsɛ mankɛm sɛchi bɛbhárɛ́bhɔ bhi.
Mpok mánaŋ bǎbhɛbhɛ mɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ nkʉ, bághɔ́ bɛ́ mbɨ́kɨ́ kʉ yɛ̌nyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́yàŋ bɛ mángwáy mɛ. Bátɨ bɛrɔ mɛ.
Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ Mandɛm apu yap mmu chi bɛkoŋo nkaysi bakwǎŋwaŋ, nɛ puyɛ̌ chi bɛkoŋo bɛtaŋ ɛbhɛn mmu afyɛ́ bɛkʉ bɛtɨk. Ǎyap mmu chi ndu ághɔ̀ yi ntínso.
Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ bhɔ́ŋ bɛ́chwé ndǔ barak ɛ́púsí mbɔ ɛnyǔ mbɔk ɛyap bákʉ̀ nyaka, ɛ́kʉ́ nká bo ɛsa nsɛm ɛ́rát (23000) ndǔ nkwɔ́ wap bágú ndǔ nywɔp nɛ́mɔ́t.
Kɛ ngɔ bɛ ɛbhé ɛchak ɛ́chí ndǔ amʉɛt ɛya ɛnɛ́ ɛ́nù nɛ nkaysi aya, ɛ́nkʉ nɔkɔ bɛ mbak ndǔ kɛsɛmɛ́ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛn bɛbhʉɛt ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ɛna.

Sɛ́ndɔ́ yɛ bɛyɨŋɨ nɔkɔ chi ndiɛrɛ mɛnyɨŋɨ́ mbɨ ɛ̌ti Yesu Kristo, sɛ́ndɔ́k ambɨ ndu bɛchak bɛ sɛ́nsɛ́nɛ́ ndǔ nɛjwǐmɛm ɛnɛsɛ. Sɛ́bhɨ́kɨ́ pɛrɛ bhɔŋ bɛsɔt mpok bɛrɛm ɛ̌ti mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́kɛ́mɛ́ nɛka ɛnɛsɛ mbɔ ɛbhɛn bɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛtɨknsɛm ndǔ bɛbʉ́ ɛbhi, andɔ bɛkʉ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ yi chi nɛ nɛwú, nɛ bɛ mmu abhɔŋ bɛka nɛ Mandɛm.
Ndu ɛchi nɔ, bǎkɛ́ rɔ yɛ̌ mmu ámbyák yi. Tɨ́k ká yi sayri bɛ ámpɛtnsɛm ntá ya. Batɨ̌ bǒnkwɔ nɛ mmɛ sɛ́nòŋ yi.

Bɔ̌ma, mbák mmu árɛm bɛ́ yí abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm kɛ yí kɛkʉ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ yi ánkʉ, ɛyɔ ɛ́kwàk yi ná? Bɛ́rɛ́m chi nɛ nyu bɛ yi abhɔŋ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, apú kwáy bɛ́pɛ́mɛ yi wáwák ndǔ ɛwak ɛnɛ Mandɛm átàŋ bo.
Mbɔk bo Yerusalɛm báré rɛm yɛ bɛ, “Pú mmǔ rɛ́ báyàŋ bɛway nɛ?
Yesu árɛ́mɛ́ nɔ́kɔ́ nɔ́, afɛ́p bhɔ ɛ̌yú, arɛm bɛ, “Dɔ̌ ka Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ ámbák nɛ bhe.
Bábhɨ́kɨ́ rɨŋɨ ɛnyu Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mámbák chak bɛsí bhi. Mánù chi bɛkʉ wap mbi anɛ bɔ babhak chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛ́kʉ bábhɨ́kɨ́ ka mbi anɛ yi ákʉ̀ bo mambak chak bɛsí bhi.

Ɛ́chí yɛ bɛ yɛ̌ agha anɛ anoko Mmɔ Mandɛm, ǎrɨŋɨ̀ amɛm ntɨ ɛni bɛ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm arɛmɛ ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi ɛchí tɛtɛp. Bǒ abhɛn bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko bárɛ̀m bɛ Mandɛm ǎsè chi nsé mbɔnyunɛ bɔ́ bábhɨ́kɨ́ noko ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi árɛ̀m ɛ̌ti Mɔ́ywi.
Tɛtɛ̌tɛp, “Mmu anɛ asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ mɛ, ǎkway bɛ́kʉ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mɛ̌kʉ̀. Ǎkwáy bɛ́kʉ yɛ̌ chí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́chá ɛbhɛn, mbɔnyunɛ mɛ̌rɔ̀ŋ ntá Ɛtaya.
Ghatí bo abhɛn báchí basɛm bɛ ɛ́rɨ mángók nɔkɔ bachi bhap ndǔ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ. Ɛrɨ bɛ mámbɔŋ ntɨ bɛkʉ bachi bhap mámbɔŋ maŋák nɛ bhɔ mpoknkɛm nɛ bɛ bákɛ́ kɛmɛ bhɔ ɛyɔŋ anyu.
Kʉ ká yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ rɔ bɛrɨ̌ndu Mandɛm mɛmfʉɛt yi. Kʉ ka yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ bɛ yɛ̌ mmu ákɛ́ nɛn mbɔ kɛ́ngɔ́-bɛchi. Mɛnyǔ bo bhɔ bátwɔ̀ nɛ ɛsɔŋɔri mánchɔŋti bapɛ́m bɛyǎ bho.
Abhɔŋ bɛbhak mmǔ anɛ bǒ nɛfí nkwɔ báchyɛ̀ kɛnókó. Mbák ɛ́pú nɔ, bákwày bɛ́chyɛ yi ntíánwɔ́p ankwɛ́n ndǔ ntá Satan.
Kɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ ayi njɛnti akap kɛkúrí anɛ Kristo áchyɛ́ yi ndu bɛkʉ bɛtɨk nɛ wu.
Ángɛl anɛ ajwi bapay apɨkɨri ɛyǐ ɛkwɔp amɛm manyu. Manyu ayibhiri arɔp mbɔ manoŋ amɛn ngú, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛchi nɛpɛ́m amɛm manyu ɛ́gú.
Bǎkɛ́ ghok bhɔ chi ndiɛrɛ bɛsí bhap nɛ ndǔ bɛkʉ bɔ mambɔŋ maŋák. Kɛ kʉ ka ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Mandɛm áyàŋ mǎnkʉ nɛ ntɨ nɛnkɛm mbɔ basɛm Kristo.
Bʉrɛ́ ká batɨ yɛka pɛ́pɛ́p, bɛ mpok bo básɔ̀kɔti bhe ɛ̌ti ɛrɨ́tí ɛkakánɛkɔ ɛyɛka mbɔ bakoŋó Kristo, ntíánwɔ́p ánkɛm bɔ.
Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ Ɛta áyàŋ chí bɛ́ yɛ̌ agha anɛ ághɔ́ Mɔ́ywi, asɨkɨ ntɨ nɛ yi, ámbɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m ɛnɛn nɛbhɨkɨ bhɔŋ ngwɛnti. Nɛ chɔŋ nkʉ yi ampɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m ndǔ nywɔp ɛnɛn ngwɛnti.”
Tɛ́mté wu, ángɛl Mandɛm aguɛ́p yi nɛme amʉɛt mbɔnyunɛ arɔ́ bo mánchyɛ yi kɛnókó ɛkɛn babhɔŋɔ bɛchyɛ chi ntá Mandɛm. Kɛ́nyoŋo kɛ́nyíɛ́ yi, agú.
Sɛ́mbɨ́tí Mandɛm nɛ Chi Yesu Kristo Acha ywɛsɛ. Achí Mandɛm ntínso nɛ ǎchyɛ bhɛsɛ nɛpɔptǐntɨ́.
Mbɔk bho bárɔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bágúrɛ ɛbhɨ ndu kɛ́mbwɔ́bhɛ́ ntí ti.
Mbɨ́kɨ́ bhɔŋ ntíánwɔ́p ɛ̌ti Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ mbɔnyunɛ yɔ achi bɛtaŋ Mandɛm ndǔ bɛpɛmɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ánókó yɔ bɛbho nɛ bo Israɛl, nɛ bɛghaka ntá abhɛn bapu bo Israɛl nkwɔ.
Yesu Kristo kɛ̌ áchí nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɛ́n bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛ́tée ɛkɛt arɛ́. Nɛ yí kɛ̌ áchí nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt ɛnɛ́n bághókó bábhʉ́rɛ́. Yɛ̌ nɛbhʉ́ɛ́rɛ́kɛt nɛ́chák nɛ́pú ɛnɛn mmu ákway bɛ́ghóko.
Kɛ ɛ́chí ɛnyu ɛyɔ nɛ bhe nkwɔ. Yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu abhɔŋ bɛkɔŋ ngɔrɛ́ ywi mbɔnyu ákɔ́ŋɔ́ mmʉɛt ɛyi yímbɔŋ, nɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ngɔrɛ́ abhɔŋ bɛchyɛ nnɛ́m ywi kɛnókó.
Bǎchi nyaka chi bawú ɛ̌ti bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛka mbɔnyunɛ bábhɨ́kɨ́re fyɛ nyaka be ɛrɨŋ amʉɛt bɛtɔŋ bɛ bǎchi bo Mandɛm. Kɛ achyɛ́ bhe nɛpɛ́m nɛkɔ nɛ Kristo ndu áfóŋórí bɛbʉ́ ɛbhɛsɛ mɛnkɛm.
Kɛ́ rɔ akap anɛ́ ɔ́bhɔ́ŋɔ́ myákámyáká, nɔ chí akap anɛ́ nyaka barɛmɛ́ kɛpɨ̌ntɨ bágháti ɛ̌ti yɛ nɛ ɛ́kʉ bǒ batí mányáŋa wɔ amɔ́ antí bɛ́ ántwɔ́ ntá yɛ.
Ngɔ́ yɛ mfǎy nkɔ nɛ mmɨk nkɔ. Mfǎy anɛ mbɨ nɛ mmɨk anɛ mbɨ mǎnáŋ mánɛmsi nyaka. Manyu nkwɔ́ kɛpɛrɛ bhák.
Bák ká maŋák mpoknkɛm,
Mpok yɔ, chɔŋ bo mánjaŋ nɛwú, kɛ bápú ghɔ́ nɔ́. Mámbɨŋɨ nɛwú, kɛ nɛwú nɛ́mbʉɛ bhɔ.
Tɛ̌ndu sɛ́nókó bɛ́ Yesu ágú nyaka, apɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m, sɛ́noko nkwɔ bɛ chɔŋ Mandɛm ankʉ bakoŋo Yesu abhɛn bágú mámpɛtnsɛm ndǔ nɛpɛ́m mpok Yesu átwɔ.
Yɛ̌ agha anɛ árɛ̀m kpoŋoroŋ bɛ Yesu chi Mmɔ Mandɛm, Mandɛm ǎbhɔŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ yi, nɛ yí ǎbhɔ́ŋ nɛbharɛ́mʉɛt nɛ Mandɛm.
Fɛrɛ́ yɛ́ ka ɛsɨ́ mkpá ayɛka anɛ áchyɛ̀ nyaka be ɛbɛ́ptí ɛkakánɛkɔ. Bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn mǎŋwaka nyaka bɛkʉ bɛ́rwɔ̀ nyaka bhe nɛ mɛ́nchɔŋti nɔkɔ batɨ̌ yɛka amɛm.
Mɛ kɛ nchí mbǐnywɔp. Mmu anɛ áfʉɛ̀t ntá ya kɛ anchwe, ɛnyɨŋ ɛ́pú tɔk yi. Ǎchwè, amfú mbɔ ɛnyǔ yi ákɔ́ŋɔ́, ambɔ́ŋ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ yi áyàŋ.

Bátɛ́mti mbɔk nɛ batay baway, bákpɔ́t abhɛ́nɛ́fú mbɨŋ ɛpay nɛ nsɔ̌. Báwáy báchák nɛ bɔ akparɛnja. Mbɔk yap báré kɔ nɛ nkwɔbhɛ́mɛ́n amʉɛt mbɔ ɛyap ndɛn, nɛ babhak ndu kɛchɛp. Bo báré chyɛ bhɔ nɛnyok nɛ bɛsɔŋɔri mɛnyu nɛ mɛnyu.
Bǎrɨŋɨ bɛ yi achi chak bɛsí Mandɛm. Bǎbhɔŋ yɛ bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu anɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛchi chak bɛsí Mandɛm achi mmɔ́ Mandɛm.
Ɛnyu ɛyɔ kɛ Mandɛm Acha ághátí bhɛsɛ sɛnkʉ, mpok árɛ́mɛ́ bɛ, ‘Nkʉ wɔ ɔ́mbák ɛrɔ́ŋɔ́ ntá bo abhɛn bápú bo Israɛl, bɛ́ ndǔ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm, ɔ́nkwak mmɨk nkɛm ambɔŋ nɛpɛ́m.’”

Sɛ́fɛ́rɛ́ ntí ndǔ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bɛ́twɔ̀ nɛ ntíánwɔ́p nɛ ndǔ bɛbɛ́ptí mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛn bo bákʉ̀ ansɛm ansɛm. Sɛ́pú kʉ bɛtábhá nɛ mmu wáwák nɛ sɛpu mɔ bɛyibhiri Ɛyɔŋ Mandɛm. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ sɛ́kʉ̀ chi bɛghati bho tɛtɛp Mandɛm ɛnyu ɛnɛ́ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ mmu ákwày bɛrɨŋɨ bɛ sɛchi bǒ tɛtɛp bɛsí Mandɛm.

Mandɛm achyɛ yí bɛyǎ kɛnókó ndu akʉ yi achɔkɔ ɛbhe awɔ́nɛm ɛyi ndǔ ɛnɔkɔ́ kɛfɔ. Ɛta abhʉrɛ bariɛp ami ndu achyɛ yí Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ. Nɛ chí Ɛfóŋó Bɛdyɛrɛ mmu Yesu achyɛ bhɛsɛ kɛ ákʉ̀ mɛnyɨŋ ɛbhɛ́n bɛ́fàkari nɛ mbɔ ɛnyǔ bǎghɔ̀ nɛ bǎghòk.
nɛ bǎrɔbhɛ koŋo chi ɛpɨŋ ɛkɔ. Bǎyíbhírí bǎrɔp bǒ bakɔ nɛ bǎyìbhiri mǎndɔkɔ nɔkɔ chi ambɨ mǎndɔbhɛ nɔkɔ mbɔ Mandɛm. Yi kɛ ághókó bhe mbɔ bǒ bakɔ bɛ mǎndɨŋɨ yɛ̌ntɨkɨ ɛnyɨŋ ɛ̌ti yi.
Yesu ághókó nɔ́kɔ́ ntó ɛnɛn arɛm bɛ, “Nɛme ɛnɛ́n nɛ́pú nɛmě nɛwú, nɛ́chí chí bɛ́kʉ bo mángɔ́ bɛtaŋ Mandɛm. Nɛ́twɔ chí bɛ nɛ́mbák ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ́ ɛ́kʉ̀ bo mángɔ́ bɛ Mmɔ Mandɛm abhɔŋ bɛtaŋ.”

Mbok Ndɨ́ndɨ́ kɛ ákʉ̀ mándɨ́ŋɨ́ ɛnyu Mandɛm ákʉ̀ bo mambak chak bɛsí bhi. Ɛnyɨŋ ɛnɛ ɛ́yàŋ chi bɛ bo mámbɔ́ŋ nɛka nɛ Yesu, mándɔk ambɨ bɛkʉ nɔ tɛ ndǔ ngwɛnti. Ɛchi mbɔ ɛnyǔ Ɛkáti Mandɛm ɛ́rɛ̀m bɛ, “Mmu anɛ ábhɔ́ŋɔ́ nɛka nɛ Mandɛm, Mandɛm ákʉ̀ yi ambak chak bɛsí bhi nɛ chɔŋ ambɔ́ŋ nɛpɛ́m.”
Básɔ́t ɛkotákátí ɛnɛ́ bábhɔ́ŋɔ́ bɛgo Yesu arɛ báchyɛ́ yímbɔŋ ámpɔ́kɔ́. Apɔkɔ kpát bárɔ́k bágháká ndǔ ɛbhak ɛnɛ́ bábhɨ̀ŋɨ bɛ́ Golgóta, nɔ́ chi “Nɛbhʉɛt Ɛnkɔ́nti.”
